text: Hastur cannot be defeated. Forced - If there is at least 3 [per_investigator] damage on Hastur: Advance this agenda.

name: Madness Drowns
text: Hastur gets +1 fight and cannot be defeated. Forced - If there is at least 5 [per_investigator] damage on Hastur: Advance this agenda.

name: Madness Dies
text:
Hastur gets +2 fight.
Hastur cannot be defeated unless an investigator "know the secret."

name: In Lost Carcosa
text: Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance.

name: Search For the Stranger (v.I)
text: Each investigator cannot discover clues. The Man in the Pallid Mask cannot be defeated. Objective - While the lead investigator is at The Man in the Pallid Mask's location, he or she may spend [action] [action] [action] to advance.

name: The Pallid Mask
text: Revelation - Put The Pallid Mask into play, under the lead investigator's control. Remove The Man in the Pallid Mask from the game. Spawn the set-aside Hastur (The Tattered King) enemy at the Palace of the King. The Pallid Mask cannot leave play. You get -2 sanity.

name: Search For the Stranger (v.II)
text: Each investigator cannot discover clues. The Man in the Pallid Mask cannot be defeated except by his [action] ability. Objective - When The Man in the Pallid Mask would be defeated by his [action] ability, advance.

name: Search For the Stranger (v.III)
text: Each investigator cannot discover clues. The Man in the Pallid Mask cannot be defeated except by damage. Objective - When The Man in the Pallid Mask would be defeated by damage, advance.

name: The King in Tatters
text: [free] If there are no clues on your location: Remove each investigator's clues from the game. Flip your location over and resolve the text on the other side. Objective - If Hastur is defeated, advance.

name: Bleak Plains
text: While you are at Bleak Plains, you cannot play [[Ally]] assets.

name: Bleak Plains
text: While you are at Bleak Plains, you cannot play [[Ally]] assets.

name: Ruins of Carcosa
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Ruins of Carcosa: Take 1 damage.

name: Ruins of Carcosa
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Ruins of Carcosa: Take 1 damage.

name: Ruins of Carcosa
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Ruins of Carcosa: Take 1 damage.

name: Dim Streets
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Dim Streets: Lose 1 action.

name: Dim Streets
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Dim Streets: Lose 1 action.

name: Dim Streets
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Dim Streets: Lose 1 action.

name: Depths of Demhe
text: While you are at Depths of Demhe, you cannot play fast cards.

name: Depths of Demhe
text: While you are at Depths of Demhe, you cannot play fast cards.

name: Palace of the King
text: Palace of the King cannot be flipped over unless Hastur has at least 5 [per_investigator] damage on him.

name: Hastur
text: Cannot be damaged except by story card effects. Forced - At the beginning of the enemy phase, if Hastur is ready: Hastur attacks each investigator, in player order (regardless of their location). If Hastur's attack deals you horror in excess of your sanity, you take 1 damage, as well. [action]: Test [willpower] (X), where X is Hastur's fight value. If you succeed, exhaust Hastur. Any investigator may trigger this action.

name: Hastur
text: Prey - Most remaining sanity. Hunter. Massive. If Hastur's attack deals you horror in excess of your sanity, you take 1 damage, as well. While Hastur is being attacked or evaded by an investigator with no remaining sanity, treat each [elder_sign], "+1," "0," or "-1" token that investigator reveals as a [auto_fail] token.

name: Hastur
text: Prey - Most remaining sanity. Hunter. If Hastur's attack deals you horror in excess of your sanity, you take 1 damage, as well. While Hastur is being attacked or evaded by an investigator with no remaining sanity, treat each [elder_sign], "+1," "0," or "-1" token that investigator reveals as a [auto_fail] token.

name: Creature Out of Demhe
text: Spawn - Depths of Demhe. Massive. Forced - When Creature out of Demhe's location or a connecting location is flipped over, if Creature out of Demhe is ready: It attacks each investigator at that location.

name: Winged One
text: Spawn - Bleak Plains. Retaliate. Forced - After a location is flipped over, if Winged One is ready and unengaged: Move it once toward that location.

name: Dismal Curse
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you have no remaining sanity, this test gets +2 difficulty. If you fail, take 2 damage (4 damage instead if you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity).

name: Realm of Madness
text: Revelation - Discard cards from your play area and/or from your hand with a total printed resource cost of at least X, where X is the amount of horror on your investigator. If no cards are discarded by this effect, take 2 horror.

name: The Final Act
text: Surge. Revelation - If you have no remaining sanity, place 2 doom on the current agenda. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance.

name: Possession (Traitorous)
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Possession (Traitorous) to your hand. If you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity, you are immediately eliminated and killed. You may commit this card to a skill test at your location. That test automatically fails.

name: Possession (Torturous)
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Possession (Torturous) to your hand. If you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity, you are immediately eliminated and killed. [action] Spend 5 resources: Discard Possession (Torturous) from your hand.

name: Possession (Murderous)
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Possession (Murderous) to your hand. If you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity, you are immediately eliminated and killed. [action] Deal 2 damage to an investigator at your location: Discard Possession (Murderous) from your hand.

name: Leo Anderson
text:
[reaction] After your turn begins: Play an [[Ally]] asset, reducing its cost by 1.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. Search the top 3 cards of your deck for an [[Ally]] asset and draw it. Shuffle your deck.

name: Ursula Downs
text:
[reaction] After you move to a location: Take an investigate action. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. After this test ends, you may move to a connecting location.

name: Finn Edwards
text:
You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to evade.
[elder_sign] effect: +1 for each exhausted enemy in play. If you succeed by 2 or more, you may discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Father Mateo
text:
[reaction] When an investigator reveals an [auto_fail] chaos token: Cancel that token and treat it as an [elder_sign] token, instead. (Limit once per game.)
[elder_sign] effect: You automatically succeed. After this test ends, either (choose one):
 - Draw 1 card and gain 1 resource.
 - If it is your turn, you may take an additional action this turn.

name: Calvin Wright
text:
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect] for each horror on you.
You get +1 [combat] and +1 [agility] for each damage on you.
[elder_sign] effect: +0. You may either heal 1 damage or horror, or take 1 direct damage or direct horror.

name: Mitch Brown
text:
Leo Anderson deck only.
You have 2 additional ally slots, which can only be used to hold non-unique allies.

name: Bought in Blood
text: Revelation - You must either discard an [[Ally]] asset you control from play, or discard each [[Ally]] asset from your hand. If no assets are discarded by this effect, shuffle Bought in Blood back into your deck.

name: Jake Williams
text:
Ursula Downs deck only.
The first move or investigate action you perform each turn does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After you reveal a location or put a new location into play, exhaust Jake Williams: Draw 1 card.

name: Call of the Unknown
text: Revelation - Put Call of the Unknown into play in your threat area. Forced - At the beginning of your turn: Choose a location other than your location. When your turn ends, if you did not successfully investigate the chosen location this turn, take 2 horror and shuffle Call of the Unknown back into your deck.

name: Smuggled Goods
text:
Finn Edwards deck only.
Play only if there are no ready enemies at your location.
Search either your discard pile or the top 9 cards of your deck for an [[Illicit]] card and draw it. If you searched your deck, shuffle Smuggled Goods into your deck.

name: Finn's Trusty .38
text: Finn Edwards deck only. Fast. Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If the attacked enemy is not engaged with you, you deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Caught Red-Handed
text: Revelation - Ready each enemy at your location or a connecting location. Each hunter enemy at a connecting location moves 1 location toward you. If no enemies move as a result of this effect, shuffle Caught Red-Handed back into your deck.

name: The Codex of Ages
text: Father Mateo deck only. Seal ([elder_sign]). You get +1 [willpower] while there is a token sealed here. [reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag, discard The Codex of Ages: Resolve the [elder_sign] token that was sealed here as if it were just revealed from the chaos bag (instead of revealing a token from the chaos bag).

name: Serpents of Yig
text: Prey - Father Mateo only. Hunter. Revelation - Search the chaos bag for the [elder_sign] chaos token and seal it on Serpents of Yig.

name: Until the End of Time
text:
Calvin Wright deck only.
Direct damage and direct horror may be assigned to Until the End of Time.

name: Voice of the Messenger
text: Revelation - You must either (choose one): - Take 1 direct damage and suffer 1 physical trauma. - Take 1 direct horror and suffer 1 mental trauma.

name: Survival Knife
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. [reaction] After an enemy attack deals damage to you during the enemy phase, exhaust Survival Knife: Fight. This attack targets the attacking enemy. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Venturer
text:
Uses (3 supplies).
[free] Spend 1 supply and exhaust Venturer: Place 1 supply or ammo on an asset controlled by an investigator at your location.

name: Trusted
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Attach to an [[Ally]] asset you control.
Attached asset gets +1 health and +1 sanity.

name: Reliable
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Attach to an [[Item]] asset you control.
While resolving a triggered ability on attached asset, you get +1 to each of your skills.

name: Dr. Elli Horowitz
text: [reaction] After Dr. Elli Horowitz enters play: Search the top 9 cards of your deck for a [[Relic]] asset and attach it to her. Shuffle your deck. Each [[Relic]] asset attached to Dr. Elli Horowitz does not take up any slots (it is still considered to be in play and under your control).

name: Ancient Stone
text: [action]: Investigate. Your location gets +3 shroud for this investigation. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at your location, discard Ancient Stone, and record in your Campaign Log that "you have identified the stone." Next to this, in parentheses, record the difficulty of this skill test.

name: Tooth of Eztli
text:
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [agility] while resolving an ability on a treachery card.
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test while resolving an ability on a treachery card, exhaust Tooth of Eztli: Draw 1 card.

name: Unearth the Ancients
text: Investigate. Choose a [seeker] asset in your hand. The difficulty of this skill test is equal to the chosen asset's printed cost. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, put the chosen asset into play. If that asset has the [[Relic]] trait, draw 1 card.

name: Treasure Hunter
text: You get +1 [intellect]. Forced - At the end of the upkeep phase: You must either pay 1 resource or discard Treasure Hunter.

name: Decorated Skull
text: Uses (0 charges). [reaction] After an investigator, [[Ally]] asset, or enemy at your location is defeated: Place 1 resource (from the token bank) on Decorated Skull, as a charge. [action] Spend 1 charge: Draw 1 card and gain 1 resource.

name: Eavesdrop
text: Choose an unengaged enemy at your location. Test [intellect] (X), where X is the evade value of the chosen enemy. If you succeed, discover 2 clues at your location.

name: "You handle this one!"
text:
Fast. Play after you draw a non-peril encounter card, but before resolving that card's effects.
Choose another investigator. That investigator is considered to have drawn that encounter card instead. Gain 1 resource.

name: Mists of R'lyeh
text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, after evading the chosen enemy, you may move to a connecting location. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this evasion attempt, choose and discard a card from your hand.

name: The Chthonian Stone
text: Seal ([skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing]). Forced - After you reveal an [auto_fail] symbol during a skill test: Return The Chthonian Stone to your hand.

name: Protective Incantation
text: Group limit 2 copies of Protective Incantation in play. Seal (any except [auto_fail]). Forced - At the end of your turn: You must either spend 1 resource or discard Protective Incantation.

name: Dark Prophecy
text:
Fast. Play when you would reveal a chaos token.
Reveal 5 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose one of those tokens with a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol to resolve, and ignore the rest. (If no such token is revealed, choose any one of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the rest.)

name: Improvised Weapon
text: You may play Improvised Weapon from your discard pile. If you do, shuffle it into your deck after resolving its effects. Fight. The attacked enemy gets -1 fight for this attack. (If you played Improvised Weapon from your discard pile, this attack deals +1 damage.)

name: Dumb Luck
text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less during an evasion attempt against a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
Place that enemy on top of the encounter deck.

name: Yaotl
text:
[free] Exhaust Yaotl: During this skill test, you get a bonus to each skill equal to the number of matching skill icons on the top card of your discard pile (not counting [wild] icons).
[free]: Discard the top card of your deck. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Last Chance
text:
Commit only to a skill test with no other cards committed to it. Other cards cannot be committed to this skill test.
Last Chance loses [wild] for each card in your hand.

name: Backpack
text:
[reaction] After Backpack enters play: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for up to 3 non-weakness [[Item]] or [[Supply]] cards, and attach them facedown to Backpack. Shuffle your deck.
Cards attached to Backpack may be played as if they were in your hand. If there are no cards attached to Backpack, discard it.

name: Dark Pact
text: Campaign Mode only. Deal 2 damage to an investigator at your location. Forced - When the game ends or you are eliminated, if Dark Pact is still in your hand: Remove Dark Pact from your deck. Search the collection for The Price of Failure and add it to your deck.

name: The Price of Failure
text: Revelation - Take 2 damage and 2 horror. Place 1 doom on the current agenda (this effect can cause the current agenda to advance). Remove The Price of Failure from your deck. Search the collection for Dark Pact and place it in your discard pile.

name: Doomed
text: Campaign Mode only. Revelation - Take 1 horror. In your Campaign Log, under your investigator's earned story assets/weaknesses, record that "doom approaches." If this was already recorded, remove Doomed from your deck, search the collection for Accursed Fate, and place it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Accursed Fate
text: Revelation - Take 2 horror. In your Campaign Log, under your investigator's earned story assets/weaknesses, record that "the hour is nigh." If this was already recorded, remove Accursed Fate from your deck, search the collection for The Bell Tolls, and place it on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Bell Tolls
text: Revelation - The hour of your demise has arrived. You are killed.

name: Expedition into the Wild
text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it.

name: Intruders
text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it.

name: Exploring the Rainforest
text: Objective - When the round ends, investigators at any non-[[Campsite]] locations may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Huntress of the Eztli
text: Objective - If Ichtaca is defeated, advance. Objective - If there are 1 [per_investigator] clues on Ichtaca, place her in the victory display and advance.

name: Search for the Ruins
text: Each Eztli Guardian enemy cannot attack or be attacked. Ignore the effects of each Arrows from the Trees treachery. Objective - Only investigators at the Ruins of Eztli can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: The Guarded Ruins
text: Each Eztli Guardian enemy gets +1 fight and +1 evade. Each Arrows from the Trees treachery gains surge. Objective - Only investigators at the Ruins of Eztli can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Expedition Camp
text: [action]: Resign. The wilds are too dangerous! [action]: Check your supplies. If you have a map, look at the top 3 cards of the exploration deck. Place 1 on the bottom and the other 2 on top, in any order.

name: Alejandro Vela
text:
You get +1 skill value while investigating an [[Ancient]] location.
[action] If you are at an [[Ancient]] location, exhaust Alejandro Vela: Draw 2 cards.

name: Ichtaca
text: Alert. Retaliate. [action]: Parley. Test [intellect] (4) to convince Ichtaca you are not her enemy. If you succeed, place 1 clue on her. If you fail and Ichtaca is ready, she attacks you.

name: Ruins of Eztli
text: Forced - After you fail a skill test while investigating Ruins of Eztli: Draw the top card of the encounter deck.

name: Something Stirs…
text: *This agenda gets +1 [per_investigator] doom threshold. Forced - When this agenda advances: Do not remove doom from each location in play.

name: The Temple Warden
text: *This agenda gets +1 [per_investigator] doom threshold.

name: Into the Ruins
text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it.

name: Magic and Science
text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Objective - Only investigators in the Chamber of Time may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Escape the Ruins
text: While there are 3 or more vengeance points in the victory display, each [[Serpent]] enemy gets +1 evade. Objective - If each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

name: Entryway
text: [action]: Resign. You've escaped… for now. [action]: Check your supplies. If you have torches, look at the top 2 cards of the exploration deck. Discard each treachery looked at by this effect. Shuffle the exploration deck.

name: Harbinger of Valusia
text: Alert. Hunter. Retaliate. Harbinger of Valusia can retaliate while exhausted. Forced - After Harbinger of Valusia is successfully attacked or evaded: Place 1 resource on it. Then, if there are 2 [per_investigator] resources on it, it vanishes with a sinister hiss. (Set it aside, out of play. It keeps all damage tokens.)

name: Ancient Hall
text: Forced - At the end of the round: Flip 1 of the clues on Ancient Hall to its doom side. Any investigator at Ancient Hall may spend 3 resources to cancel this effect.

name: Grand Chamber
text: Forced - When you investigate Grand Chamber and do not succeed by at least 2: Before resolving any other effects from this skill test, flip 1 of the clues on Grand Chamber to its doom side.

name: Burial Pit
text: Forced - After you put Burial Pit into play by exploring successfully: You must either draw 2 cards from the top of the encounter deck or place 2 doom on Burial Pit, or any combination thereof.

name: Underground Ruins
text: While there is an enemy in Underground Ruins, Underground Ruins is considered to be in the victory display (for the purposes of counting vengeance). Forced - After an enemy in Underground Ruins leaves play: Place 1 doom on Underground Ruins.

name: Secret Passage
text: Forced - After you enter Secret Passage: You must either take 1 horror and 1 damage, or place 1 doom on Secret Passage. Check your supplies. If you or an investigator at Secret Passage has a rope, ignore this effect.

name: Chamber of Time
text: Forced - After Chamber of Time enters play: Attach the set-aside Relic of Ages asset to the Chamber of Time. Place 1 doom on Chamber of Time.

name: Path of Thorns
text: Forced - After you fail a skill test while investigating Path of Thorns: Take 1 damage. Forced - After you explore while at Path of Thorns, if the exploration was not successful: Take 1 damage.

name: River Canyon
text: [action]: Heal 1 damage from an investigator at River Canyon. Check your supplies. If you have a canteen, heal 2 additional damage. (Limit once per game.)

name: Rope Bridge
text: Forced - When you attempt to explore while at Rope Bridge: Test [agility] (2). If you fail, cancel the exploration, take 2 damage, lose all remaining actions, and end your turn. Place your investigator in the River Canyon (if it is not in play, search the exploration deck for River Canyon and put it into play first; shuffle the exploration deck).

name: Serpent's Haven
text: Each [[Serpent]] enemy at Serpent's Haven gets +1 fight. Forced - After you investigate or explore while at Serpent's Haven, if you are poisoned: Take 1 damage.

name: Circuitous Trail
text: As an additional cost for you to investigate or explore while at Circuitous Trail, check your supplies. If no investigator at your location has a compass, you must spend 3 resources.

name: Temple of the Fang
text: Temple of the Fang gets +1 shroud for each vengeance point in the victory display.

name: Overgrown Ruins
text: Forced - After you enter this location, if you are poisoned: Lose all remaining actions and end your turn.

name: Overgrowth
text: Revelation - Attach to your location. Limit 1 per location. You cannot explore at attached location. [action]: Test [combat] (4) to hack through the brush or [intellect] (4) to find another route. If you succeed, discard Overgrowth.

name: Voice of the Jungle
text: Revelation - Put Voice of the Jungle into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you did not successfully explore this turn: Take 1 horror. [action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Voice of the Jungle.

name: Pit Viper
text: Forced - After Pit Viper deals you damage from its attack: If you are not poisoned, put a set-aside Poisoned weakness into play in your threat area.

name: Boa Constrictor
text: Hunter. Forced - After Boa Constrictor attacks you: During the next upkeep phase, your exhausted cards cannot ready.

name: Snake Bite
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (3). If you fail, you must either (choose one): - Deal 5 damage to an [[Ally]] asset you control. - Take 1 direct damage. If you are not poisoned, put a set-aside Poisoned weakness into play in your threat area.

name: Lost in the Wilds
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, take 1 horror for each point you fail by and add Lost in the Wilds to your threat area. You cannot move or explore. Forced - At the end of your turn: Discard Lost in the Wilds.

name: Low on Supplies
text: Peril. Revelation - You must decide (choose one): - Each investigator loses 2 resources. - Each investigator takes 1 damage. - Each investigator chooses and discards an asset he or she controls.

name: Brood of Yig
text:
Hunter.
Brood of Yig gets +1 fight for each vengeance point in the victory display.

name: Serpent from Yoth
text:
While there are 1 or more vengeance points in the victory display, Serpent from Yoth gains retaliate.
While there are 2 or more vengeance points in the victory display, Serpent from Yoth gains hunter.
While there are 3 or more vengeance points in the victory display, Serpent from Yoth takes 1 less damage from each attack made against it.

name: Curse of Yig
text: Revelation - Put Curse of Yig into play in your threat area. You get -1 [combat], -1 health, and gain the [[Serpent]] trait. [action]: Test [willpower] (2). This test gets +1 difficulty for each vengeance point in the victory display. If you succeed, discard Curse of Yig.

name: Eztli Guardian
text: Spawn - Any empty location ([[Ancient]], if able). Alert. Aloof. Forced - When enemies attack during the enemy phase, if Eztli Guardian is ready and unengaged: It attacks each investigator in each connecting location.

name: Arrows from the Trees
text: Revelation - Take 1 damage, plus 1 additional damage for each [[Ally]] asset you control. Each other investigator at an [[Ancient]] location must also resolve that effect.

name: Final Mistake
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (2). This test gets +1 difficulty for each doom on your location. If you fail, take 2 damage.

name: Entombed
text: Revelation - Put Entombed into play in your threat area. You cannot disengage from enemies or move. [action]: Test [agility] (4) to escape the tomb or [combat] (4) to break out. If you succeed, discard Entombed. If you fail, reduce the difficulty of this test by 1 until the end of the round.

name: A Tear in Time
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). For each point you fail by, you must either lose 1 action or take 1 horror.

name: Lost in Time
text: Revelation - Shuffle a non-story asset you control into your deck, moving all damage and horror from that asset to your investigator. If no asset is shuffled into your deck by this effect, choose and discard 3 cards from your hand.

name: Ill Omen
text: Peril. Revelation - Choose a location where there is at least 1 investigator. Place 1 doom on that location. Each investigator at the chosen location takes 1 horror.

name: Ancestral Fear
text: Peril. Surge. Revelation - You must either (choose one): - Place 1 doom on your location and discard Ancestral Fear (instead of placing it in the victory display). - Place Ancestral Fear in the victory display.

name: Deep Dark
text: Revelation - Put Deep Dark into play next to the agenda deck. No more than 1 clue may be discovered from each location by each investigator each round. Forced - At the end of the round: Discard 1 copy of Deep Dark from play. (Max once per round.)

name: Brotherhood Cultist
text: Hunter. Brotherhood Cultist gets +1 fight and +1 evade for each doom on it. Forced - When you initiate an attack against Brotherhood Cultist: Place 1 doom on Brotherhood Cultist.

name: Shadowed
text: Revelation - If there are no [[Cultist]] enemies in play, take 1 horror and Shadowed gains surge. Otherwise, find the [[Cultist]] enemy nearest to you. Place 1 doom on that enemy and test [willpower] (X), where X is that enemy's fight value. If you fail, take 2 horror.

name: Words of Power
text: Revelation - Put Words of Power into play in your threat area. If there are 1 or more enemies at your location with doom on them, you cannot damage those enemies or discover clues at your location. [action] [action]: Discard Words of Power.

name: Fang of Yig
text: Prey - Poisoned investigator. Retaliate. While Fang of Yig is engaged with a poisoned investigator, that investigator cannot play cards or commit cards to skill tests.

name: Snakescourge
text: Revelation - Put Snakescourge into play in your threat area. If you are poisoned, Snakescourge gains surge. Treat each of your non-weakness [[Item]] assets as if its text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]). Forced - At the end of the round: Discard Snakescourge.

name: Serpent's Call
text: Revelation - You must either (choose one): Put a set-aside Poisoned weakness into play in your threat area, or draw the top 2 cards of the encounter deck.

name: Creeping Poison
text: Surge. Revelation - Each investigator who is poisoned takes 1 damage.

name: Poisoned
text: Limit 1 per investigator. Limit 1 per deck. Permanent. You are poisoned. (This has no game effect on its own. Other card effects may change or become stronger while you are poisoned.)

name: Scene of the Crime
text:
Play only as your first action.
Discover 1 clue at your location (2 clues instead if there is an enemy at that location). This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Marksmanship
text: Fast. Play when you activate the Fight ability on a [[Firearm]] or [[Ranged]] asset. This attack can target an enemy at a connecting location. Ignore the aloof and retaliate keywords for this attack. If this attack succeeds against an enemy not engaged with you, the attack deals +1 damage.

name: Persuasion
text: Parley. Choose a non-weakness [[Humanoid]] enemy at your location and test [intellect] (3). This test gets +X difficulty, where X is that enemy's horror value. If you succeed, shuffle the chosen enemy into the encounter deck. If the chosen enemy is [[Elite]], automatically evade it instead.

name: Shrewd Analysis
text: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Anytime you upgrade a card with the (Unidentified) or (Untranslated) subtitle, you may upgrade a second copy of that card at no experience cost. If you do, the two upgraded versions are chosen at random from among the eligible options. (You must still meet all deckbuilding restrictions.)

name: Lucky Cigarette Case
text: [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test by 2 or more, exhaust Lucky Cigarette Case: Draw 1 card.

name: Fence
text: [reaction] When you play an [[Illicit]] card during your turn, exhaust Fence: The [[Illicit]] card gains fast. If it was already fast, reduce its cost by 1 instead.

name: Arcane Research
text:
Permanent.
When you purchase Arcane Research, suffer 1 mental trauma.
After each scenario of a campaign, reduce the experience cost of the first [[Spell]] card you upgrade before the next scenario by 1.

name: Counterspell
text: Fast. Play when a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] chaos token is revealed during a skill test at your location. Cancel that chaos token. (Do not reveal a new chaos token to replace it.)

name: Perseverance
text:
Fast. Play when you are assigned damage and/or horror that would defeat you.
Cancel up to 4 of that damage and/or horror.

name: Stunning Blow
text: If this skill test is successful during an attack, automatically evade the attacked enemy.

name: Three Fates
text: [action]: Resign. You don't want to risk taking too long, so you head to safety with the information you've gathered.

name: Behind the Curtain
text: [action]: Resign. You don't want to risk taking too long, so you head to safety with the information you've gathered.

name: Hidden Entanglements
text: [action]: Resign. You don't want to risk taking too long, so you head to safety with the information you've gathered.

name: The Relic Is Missing!
text: Objective - Only investigators in Miskatonic University can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Eztli Exhibit
text: Revelation - Put the Eztli Exhibit into play. Forced - After you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol while investigating the Eztli Exhibit: Take 1 horror.

name: Harlan Is in Danger!
text: Objective - Only investigators in Miskatonic University can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Harlan Earnstone
text: Revelation - Put Harlan Earnstone into play in Easttown. [action] Discard the top 3 cards of your deck: Parley. You try to snap Earnstone out of his daze. Test [willpower] (4). If you succeed, place 1 clue on him (from the token pool).

name: At the Exhibit
text: Objective - Only investigators in the Eztli Exhibit can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: At the Exhibit
text: Objective - Only investigators in the Eztli Exhibit can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Harlan's Curse
text: Objective - If there are 1 [per_investigator] clues on Harlan Earnstone: You must remove them and immediately advance.

name: Harlan's Curse
text: Objective - If there are 1 [per_investigator] clues on Harlan Earnstone: You must remove them and immediately advance.

name: Harlan Earnstone
text: Revelation - Switch this card with the [[Bystander]] version of Harlan Earnstone, removing that version from the game. Attach the set-aside Relic of Ages to Harlan Earnstone. Advance to Act 3a - "Recover the Relic." Forced - After you successfully evade Harlan Earnstone by 3 or more: Add him to the victory display.

name: Find the Relic
text: While Relic of Ages is attached to a location, that location gets +2 shroud. Objective - If Relic of Ages is attached to a location with no remaining clues, advance.

name: Recover the Relic
text: While Relic of Ages is attached to an enemy, that enemy gets +2 [per_investigator] health. Objective - If the enemy the Relic of Ages is attached to leaves play, advance.

name: Search for Alejandro
text: Objective - Only investigators in Easttown can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Henry Deveau
text: Revelation - Put Henry Deveau into play in Velma's Diner. [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Parley. You discuss Alejandro's whereabouts. Test [intellect] (3). If you succeed, place 1 clue on this card (from the token pool).

name: Missing Persons
text: Objective - Only investigators in Easttown can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Arkham Police Station
text: Revelation - Put the Arkham Police Station into play. Easttown is connected to Arkham Police Station. [action]: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for a [[weapon]] card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: At the Station
text: Objective - Only investigators in the Arkham Police Station can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: At the Station
text: Objective - Only investigators in the Arkham Police Station can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Train Tracks
text: Revelation - Put Train Tracks into play. Attach the set-aside Alejandro Vela to Train Tracks. Advance to Act 3c - "Alejandro's Prison." Northside is connected to Train Tracks. [action] Spend 1 clue: Draw 4 cards. (Limit once per game.)

name: Friends in High Places
text: Objective - If there are 1 [per_investigator] clues on Henry Deveau: You must remove them and immediately advance.

name: Friends in High Places
text: Objective - If there are 1 [per_investigator] clues on Henry Deveau: You must remove them and immediately advance.

name: Henry Deveau
text: Revelation - Switch this card with the [[Bystander]] version of Henry Deveau, removing that version from the game. Attach the set-aside Alejandro Vela to Henry Deveau. Advance to Act 3c - "Alejandro's Plight." Retaliate.

name: Alejandro's Prison
text: While Alejandro Vela is attached to a location, that location gets +2 shroud. Objective - If Alejandro Vela is attached to a location with no remaining clues, advance.

name: Alejandro's Plight
text: While Alejandro Vela is attached to an enemy, that enemy gets +2 [per_investigator] health. Objective - If the enemy Alejandro Vela is attached to leaves play, advance.

name: Trial of the Huntress
text: Objective - Only investigators in Rivertown can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Black Cave
text: Revelation - Put Black Cave into play. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you are in the Black Cave: You must either take 1 horror or choose and discard 2 cards from your hand.

name: The Guardian's Inquiry
text: Objective - Only investigators in Northside can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Maria DeSilva
text: Revelation - Put Maria DeSilva into play in the Curiositie Shoppe. [action] Spend 1 resource: Parley. You chat with Maria about the artifacts on sale. Test [intellect] (3). If you succeed, place 1 clue on her (from the token pool).

name: The Cave of Darkness
text: Objective - Only investigators in the Black Cave can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance. There must be no clues remaining on the Black Cave in order to advance this act.

name: The Cave of Darkness
text: Objective - Only investigators in the Black Cave can spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance. There must be no clues remaining on the Black Cave in order to advance this act.

name: Strange Relics
text: Objective - If there are 1 [per_investigator] clues on Maria DeSilva: You must remove them and immediately advance.

name: Maria DeSilva
text: Revelation - Switch this card with the [[Bystander]] version of Maria DeSilva, removing that version from the game. Remember that she is "Ichtaca's prey." Advance to Act 3e - "The Brotherhood is Revealed." Retaliate.

name: Strange Relics
text: Objective - If there are 1 [per_investigator] clues on Maria DeSilva: You must remove them and immediately advance.

name: Strange Occurrences
text: While you are at any of "Ichtaca's destinations," the first treachery you draw from the encounter deck each round gains surge. Objective - If there are no clues remaining on each of "Ichtaca's destinations," advance.

name: The Brotherhood Is Revealed
text: "Ichtaca's prey" each get +1 fight, +1 [per_investigator] health, and +1 evade while at a location with no clues on it. Objective - If each of "Ichtaca's prey" is no longer in play, advance.

name: Velma's Diner
text:
Easttown is connected to Velma's Diner.
[action] [action] [action]: You kill some time at the diner and listen to the conversations of the patrons around you. Gain 2 clues from the token pool. (Limit once per game.)

name: Curiositie Shoppe
text:
Northside is connected to Curiositie Shoppe.
While you are in the Curiositie Shoppe, reduce the cost of each [[relic]] asset you play by 2.

name: Town Hall
text: Downtown is connected to Town Hall. Forced - After you enter Town Hall, if you have 4 or more cards in your hand: Choose and discard cards from your hand until you have 3 cards in your hand.

name: The Secret Must Be Kept
text: Peril. Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, take 1 damage and 1 horror. For each act deck the investigators have completed, this skill test gets +1 difficulty and deals +1 damage and +1 horror if it is failed.

name: Nobody's Home
text: Revelation - Attach to your location. If there are no clues on your location, Nobody's Home gains surge. You must spend 1 additional action to investigate attached location. Forced - If there are no clues on attached location: Discard Nobody's Home.

name: Conspiracy of Blood
text: Revelation - Attach Conspiracy of Blood to the current agenda. Attached agenda gets -1 doom threshold. Each [[cultist]] enemy gains: "[action] Parley. Test [willpower] (4). If you succeed, discard 1 copy of Conspiracy of Blood from play. If you fail, place 1 doom on this enemy."

name: Ichtaca
text: You get +1 [combat] (+2 [combat] instead while attacking an enemy with Victory X). You get +1 [agility] (+2 [agility] instead while attempting to evade an enemy with Vengeance X). [reaction] After you add an enemy to the victory display, exhaust Ichtaca: You and Ichtaca each heal 1 horror.

name: Expedition Journal
text: You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to explore.

name: Second Wind
text:
Play only as your first action.
Heal 1 damage (2 instead if you drew a treachery this round). Then, draw 1 card.

name: Take the Initiative
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.
Take the Initiative loses [wild] for each action that has been completed by any investigator this phase.

name: Well Prepared
text: [free] Exhaust Well Prepared: Choose an asset you control. You get +X skill value for this skill test, where X is the number of matching skill icons on the chosen asset.

name: Truth from Fiction
text:
Play only if there is a clue on your location.
Place 2 secrets on an asset you control.

name: True Understanding
text:
Commit only to a skill test from an ability printed on a scenario card.
If this skill test is successful, discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Quick Study
text: [free] Place 1 of your clues on your location and exhaust Quick Study: You get +3 skill value for this skill test.

name: Hatchet Man
text: If this skill test is successful during an evasion attempt, the next time the evaded enemy takes damage this turn, deal it 1 additional damage.

name: High Roller
text: [free] Spend 3 resources and exhaust High Roller: You get +2 skill value for this skill test. If you succeed, gain 3 resources.

name: Enraptured
text: If this skill test is successful during an investigation, place 1 charge or secret on an asset you control.

name: Recall the Future
text: [reaction] When a skill test you are performing begins, if Recall the Future is ready, name a chaos token: If the named chaos token is revealed during this skill test, exhaust Recall the Future. Then, you get +2 skill value for this skill test.

name: Try and Try Again
text:
Uses (3 tries). If Try and Try Again has no tries, discard it.
[reaction] After a skill test is failed, if a skill card you own is committed to that test, exhaust Try and Try Again and spend 1 try: Return that skill card to your hand.

name: Cornered
text: [free] Discard 1 card from your hand: You get +2 skill value for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)

name: Crossing the Threshold
text: Objective - After the first [[Tenochtitlán]] location enters play by exploring successfully, advance.

name: Past and Present
text: Objective - Find paths to the Nexus by discovering all of the clues from as many different [[Tenochtitlán]] locations as you can before time runs out. If there are 6 [[Tenochtitlán]] locations in play with no clues on them, advance.

name: The Return Trip
text: Objective - If Padma Amrita is defeated, advance. Objective - If investigators in Templo Mayor spend the requisite number of clues, advance.

name: Temple Ruins
text: [action] [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a location with a matching location symbol in the upper-left corner, place it on top of this location, taking its place.

name: Metropolitan Cathedral
text: [action] Take 1 horror: Draw 2 cards. [action] If you have 6 or more cards in your hand: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a location with a matching location symbol in the upper-left corner, place it on top of this location, taking its place.

name: Chapultepec Park
text: Forced - After you fail a [willpower] test while at Chapultepec Park: Take 1 horror. [action]: Explore. Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a location with a matching location symbol in the upper-left corner, place it on top of this location, taking its place.

name: Zócalo
text: [action] Discard cards with a total combined cost of at least 5 from your hand: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a location with a matching location symbol in the upper-left corner, place it on top of this location, taking its place.

name: Xochimilco
text: While you are at Xochimilco, you cannot gain resources. [action] Spend 3 resources: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a location with a matching location symbol in the upper-left corner, place it on top of this location, taking its place.

name: Coyoacán
text: [action] Take 1 damage or 1 horror: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a location with a matching location symbol in the upper-left corner, place it on top of this location, taking its place.

name: Templo Mayor
text: Forced - After Templo Mayor enters play: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Serpent]] enemy is discarded. Spawn that enemy here. [reaction] After you defeat or evade a [[Serpent]] enemy at this location: Discover 1 clue at this location. (Group limit once per phase.)

name: Templo Mayor
text: Forced - After Templo Mayor enters play: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck. Discard cards from the top of your deck until a weakness is discarded. Draw that weakness. [action] Shuffle a weakness from your discard pile into your deck: Discover 2 clues at this location. (Group limit once per round.)

name: Temples of Tenochtitlán
text: Forced - After Temples of Tenochtitlán enters play: Each investigator at this location takes 1 direct damage. While you are investigating Temples of Tenochtitlán, if you have 3 or fewer remaining health, Temples of Tenochtitlán gets -2 shroud.

name: Temples of Tenochtitlán
text: Forced - After Temples of Tenochtitlán enters play: Place 1 doom on the nearest enemy. [action] Place 1 doom on an enemy: Discover 2 clues at this location. (Group limit once per round.)

name: Chapultepec Hill
text: Forced - After Chapultepec Hill enters play: Each investigator at this location discards 2 random cards from his or her hand. [action] Discard your hand of at least 3 cards: Discover 2 clues at this location. (Group limit once per round.)

name: Chapultepec Hill
text:
Each investigator at Chapultepec Hill gets -2 [willpower].
[reaction] After you draw a [[Hex]] card: Discover 1 clue at this location. (Group limit once per phase.)

name: Canals of Tenochtitlán
text:
Each enemy at Canals of Tenochtitlán gets +2 evade.
While there is an exhausted enemy at Canals of Tenochtitlán, it gets -3 shroud.

name: Canals of Tenochtitlán
text: Forced - After Canals of Tenochtitlán enters play: Place 4 resources on it. Canals of Tenochtitlán gets +1 shroud for each resource on it. Forced - At the end of the round: Discard 1 resource from Canals of Tenochtitlán.

name: Lake Xochimilco
text: Forced - After Lake Xochimilco enters play: Each investigator at this location loses all of his or her remaining actions. While you are investigating Lake Xochimilco, it gets +2 shroud for each action you have remaining.

name: Lake Xochimilco
text: Forced - After Lake Xochimilco enters play: Each investigator at this location takes 1 direct horror. While you are investigating Lake Xochimilco, if you have 3 or fewer remaining sanity, Lake Xochimilco gets -2 shroud.

name: Sacred Woods
text: Forced - After Sacred Woods enters play: Each investigator at this location discards the top 10 cards of his or her deck. [action] If you have no cards remaining in your deck: Discover all of the clues at Sacred Woods.

name: Sacred Woods
text:
While you are at Sacred Woods, increase the cost of each card you play by 2.
While you are investigating Sacred Woods, it gets -1 shroud for each asset you control.

name: Padma Amrita
text: Alert. Retaliate. Hunter. While Padma Amrita is ready, clues cannot be discovered from each [[Ancient]] location. Forced - After Padma Amrita attacks you: If you have at least 1 clue, flip 1 of your clues to its doom side. Otherwise, take 3 horror.

name: Serpent of Tenochtitlán
text: While Serpent of Tenochtitlán is at an [[Ancient]] location with clues on it, it gains retaliate and alert. Otherwise, it gains hunter. Forced - After Serpent of Tenochtitlán deals you damage from its attack: If you are not poisoned, put a set-aside Poisoned weakness into play in your threat area.

name: Hand of the Brotherhood
text: Spawn - Any empty location. Forced - After the last clue is discovered from an [[Ancient]] location, if Hand of the Brotherhood is ready: Place 1 doom on Hand of the Brotherhood. While Hand of the Brotherhood is ready, [action] and [reaction] abilities on its location and connecting locations cannot be triggered.

name: Window to Another Time
text: Peril. Revelation - You must decide (choose one): - Choose and shuffle an [[Ancient]] location back into the exploration deck (the [[Present-Day]] location underneath it takes its place). - Place 1 doom on the current agenda (this effect can cause the current agenda to advance).

name: Timeline Destabilization
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (1). This test gets +1 difficulty for each [[Ancient]] location in play. If you fail, take 1 damage and 1 horror, and shuffle Timeline Destabilization into the exploration deck.

name: Relic of Ages
text: [free] Exhaust Relic of Ages: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (4). If you succeed, remove 1 doom from the current agenda. If you fail, add 1 doom to Relic of Ages. (Max one success per game.)

name: Intrepid
text: If this skill test is successful, add Intrepid to your play area as an asset with the text: "You get +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], and +1 [agility]. Forced - At the end of the round: Discard Intrepid."

name: Custom Ammunition
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Attach to a [[Firearm]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location. Place 2 ammo on that asset. Limit 1 per asset.
Attacks performed by attached asset deal +1 damage against [[Monster]] enemies.

name: Otherworldly Compass
text: [action] Exhaust Otherworldly Compass: Investigate. Your location gets -X shroud for this investigation. X is the number of revealed locations connected to your location.

name: Expose Weakness
text:
Fast. Play during any [free] player window.
Choose an enemy at your location. Test [intellect] (X), where X is that enemy's fight value. If you succeed, treat that enemy's fight value as if it were 0 for the next attack performed against it this phase. Draw 1 card.

name: Lola Santiago
text:
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility].
[free] Exhaust Lola Santiago and spend X resources: Discover 1 clue at your location. X is the shroud value of your location.

name: Olive McBride
text: [reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token, exhaust Olive McBride: Reveal 3 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose 2 of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the other.

name: Defiance
text: Ignore the effects of all [skull], [cultist], [tablet], and [elder_thing] symbols during this test (including their modifiers).

name: Premonition
text: Fast. Play during any [free] player window. Put Premonition into play, reveal a random chaos token from the chaos bag, and seal it on Premonition. Forced - When a chaos token would be revealed from the chaos bag: Resolve the token sealed here as if it were just revealed from the chaos bag, instead. Then, discard Premonition.

name: Live and Learn
text: Fast. Play after a skill test you failed ends (after resolving all effects from the failed test). Attempt that test again. You get +2 skill value for this test.

name: Take Heart
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
You may commit Take Heart to any type of test.
If this test fails, the performing investigator draws 2 cards and gains 2 resources.

name: Against All Odds
text:
Fast. Play when you perform a skill test with a difficulty higher than your base skill value.
Reveal X additional chaos tokens for this skill test. Choose one to resolve and ignore the others. X is the difference between the test's difficulty and your base skill value.

name: Trench Coat
text: You get +1 [agility] during evasion attempts.

name: Ornate Bow
text: Uses (1 ammo). Limit 1 ammo on Ornate Bow. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. This attack uses [agility] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [agility] and deal +2 damage for this attack. [action]: You nock another arrow. Place 1 ammo on Ornate Bow.

name: Mouth of K'n-yan
text: [action]: Resign. "Let's make camp and solve this puzzle tomorrow." [action]: Check your supplies. If you have a compass, look at the top 3 cards of the exploration deck. Place 1 on the bottom and the other 2 on top, in any order.

name: Mouth of K'n-yan
text: [action]: Check your supplies. If you have a map, look at the top 2 cards of the exploration deck. Discard each treachery looked at by this effect. Shuffle the exploration deck.

name: The Jungle's Heart
text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it.

name: Setting Sun
text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it.

name: The Winged Serpent
text: Spawn - Mouth of K'n-yan. Alert. Hunter. Massive. Cannot be defeated. Cannot make attacks of opportunity. Forced - After a pillar token is placed on the Mouth of K'n-yan: Exhaust The Winged Serpent. It does not ready during the upkeep phase this round.

name: Opening the Maw
text: [action] Investigators at the Mouth of K'n-yan spend 1 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: You solve one piece of the puzzle. Add 1 resource to the Mouth of K'n-yan, as a pillar token. Objective - Solve the puzzle of the six pillars in order to enter K'n-yan. If there are 6 pillar tokens on the Mouth of K'n-yan, advance to act 2b.

name: The Lonely Caverns
text: [action] If there are no clues on your location: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Forced - When this agenda advances: Do not remove doom from each location in play.

name: Eyes in the Dark
text: [action] If there are no clues on your location: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. *This agenda gets +1 [per_investigator] doom threshold.

name: Descent into Dark
text: Objective - If each surviving investigator is at the Descent to Yoth and there is no doom on it, you may advance.

name: Pitfall
text: Peril. Revelation - You must either (choose one): - Test [agility] (3) to attempt to jump the gap. For each point you fail by, take 1 damage. - Shuffle Pitfall into the exploration deck. You cannot choose this option if Pitfall was drawn from the exploration deck.

name: Poisonous Spores
text: Revelation - Attach to your location. Forced - At the end of the round: Each investigator at the attached location who is poisoned takes 2 horror. Each investigator at the attached location who is not poisoned must put a set-aside Poisoned weakness into play in his or her threat area, instead. Discard Poisonous Spores.

name: Time-Wracked Woods
text: [action] [action]: Choose a non-[[Elite]] card worth vengeance points in the victory display. Place that card in the encounter discard pile. (Group limit once per game.)

name: Stone Altar
text: Forced - After you enter Stone Altar: Reveal a random chaos token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [elder_sign], [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, lose 1 action. If you cannot, take 1 horror instead.

name: Apex Strangleweed
text: Alert. Retaliate. Forced - After Apex Strangleweed makes an attack of opportunity against you: Check your supplies. If you do not have a pocket knife, lose all remaining actions and end your turn.

name: Basilisk
text: Prey - Nearest to the Mouth of K'n-yan. Hunter. Forced - After a pillar token is placed on the Mouth of K'n-yan: Shuffle one copy of Basilisk into the encounter deck. (Max once per round.) Vengeance 2.

name: Ants!
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (4). For each point you fail by, discard a random card from your hand or choose and discard a card from your play area.

name: Vast Passages
text: As an additional cost for you to explore while at Vast Passages, check your supplies. If no investigator at this location has binoculars, you must spend 1 additional action.

name: Hall of Idolatry
text: Forced - After you put Hall of Idolatry into play by successfully exploring: Check Campaign Log. If there are 5 or more tally marks under "Yig's Fury", draw the top card of the encounter deck (top 2 cards instead if there are 10 or more tally marks).

name: Dark Hollow
text: Forced - After Dark Hollow enters play, check your supplies. If no investigator has a map: Place 1 [per_investigator] additional clues on Dark Hollow.

name: Perilous Gulch
text: Forced - After you fail a skill test while investigating Perilous Gulch: Check your supplies. If no investigator at this location has rope, place 1 doom on Perilous Gulch.

name: Crystal Pillars
text: Forced - After you enter Crystal Pillars: Test [willpower] (1). This test gets +1 difficulty for each vengeance point in the victory display. If you fail, take 1 damage and 1 horror.

name: Descent to Yoth
text: Forced - After Descent to Yoth enters play: Each investigator must either place 1 doom on Descent to Yoth or draw the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. [reaction] After you successfully investigate Descent to Yoth: Instead of discovering clues, you may flip 1 doom on Descent to Yoth to its clue side. Vengeance 2.

name: No Turning Back
text: Revelation - Attach No Turning Back to your location or a connecting location. Limit 1 per location. Investigators cannot enter or leave attached location. [action]: Test [combat] (3) or check your supplies. If you succeed, or if you have a pickaxe, discard No Turning Back. Any investigator at a connecting location may activate this ability.

name: M1918 BAR
text: Uses (8 ammo). [action] Spend 1-5 ammo: Fight. You get +X [combat] for this attack. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals X damage. X is the amount of ammo spent as part of this ability's cost.

name: Ancient Stone
text: You can only include this asset in your deck by upgrading it from Ancient Stone (Unidentified), and only if "you have identified the stone" in your Campaign Log. Uses (X secrets). X is the number in parentheses next to "you have identified the stone." [reaction] When you draw any number of cards, spend that many secrets: Deal that much damage to an enemy at your location.

name: Ancient Stone
text: You can only include this asset in your deck by upgrading it from Ancient Stone (Unidentified), and only if "you have identified the stone" in your Campaign Log. Uses (X secrets). X is the number in parentheses next to "you have identified the stone." [reaction] When you draw any number of cards, spend that many secrets: Heal that much horror from a card at your location.

name: Slip Away
text: Evade. Add your [intellect] to your skill value for this evasion attempt. If you succeed by 2 or more and the evaded enemy is non-[[Elite]], it does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: Pay Day
text: Gain 1 resource for each action you performed this turn (including this one). If it is your turn, end your turn.

name: Sacrifice
text: Discard a [mystic] asset you control. Then, draw 3 cards or gain 3 resources, or any combination thereof.

name: Crystalline Elder Sign
text:
Seal (+1 or [elder_sign]).
You get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], and +1 [agility].

name: On Your Own
text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
Discard On Your Own if you control an asset that takes up an ally slot.
[reaction] When you play a [survivor] event, exhaust On Your Own: Reduce that event's cost by 2.

name: City of the Great Race
text: Investigators cannot put [[Item]] assets into play (including [[Item]] weaknesses).

name: Lost Memories
text: Each investigator's maximum hand size is reduced by 2.

name: Humanity Fading
text: Each investigator's maximum hand size is reduced by 4.

name: Exploring Pnakotus
text: Each copy of Yithian Observer gains aloof.

name: Restricted Access
text: Objective - If three of the following are true, you must advance: - An investigator "found the process." - An investigator "dissected an organ." - An investigator "interviewed a subject." - An investigator "realized what year it is." - An investigator "activated the device." - An investigator controls The Custodian.

name: Repossession
text: Each Yithian Observer gains hunter. [action] Spend 1 clue: Draw. Draw 2 cards instead of 1. If your hand exceeds your maximum hand size, draw 1 additional card. Objective - If each surviving investigator has 10 or more cards in his or her hand, immediately advance. (Beware - remember to complete as many of the tasks listed on act 2b as you can.)

name: Body of a Yithian
text:
Each of your [[Ally]] assets gains the [[Yithian]] trait.
[reaction] After you commit a card to a skill test you are performing: Double the skill icons on that card. (Limit once per test.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. Draw 1 card.

name: Interview Room
text: [reaction] After you begin your turn in this location, if there is a [[Yithian]] enemy in this location: Draw 1 card.

name: Interview Room
text: [action]: Parley. Test [intellect] (4) or [combat] (4) to interrogate the captive mind restrained here. If you succeed, remember that you "interviewed a subject." If you fail, take 2 horror.

name: Interview Room
text: Forced - After you enter this location: Test [willpower] (3). Take 1 horror for each point you fail by.

name: Halls of Pnakotus
text: [free] During your turn, choose and discard a card from your hand: Move to another copy of Halls of Pnakotus. (Limit once per turn.)

name: Halls of Pnakotus
text: [free] During your turn, choose and discard a card from your hand: Move to another copy of Halls of Pnakotus. (Limit once per turn.)

name: Halls of Pnakotus
text: [free] During your turn, choose and discard a card from your hand: Move to another copy of Halls of Pnakotus. (Limit once per turn.)

name: Great Library
text: [action] Spend 1 [per_investigator] clues: Test [intellect] (3) to decipher the information you've found. If you succeed, remember that you have "found the process." Forced - At the end of the round, if there are fewer than 4 clues on Great Library: Add clues to Great Library until there are 4 clues on it.

name: Yithian Orrery
text:
[action] [action] If there are no clues on Yithian Orrery: Remember that you "realized what year it is."
While you are in the Yithian Orrery, increase your maximum hand size by 2.

name: Laboratory of the Great Race
text: [action] If there are no clues on Laboratory of the Great Race: Test [agility] (3) to manipulate the controls on the technological device nearby. If you succeed, remember that you "activated the device." If you fail, place 1 clue on Laboratory of the Great Race (from the token pool).

name: Deconstruction Room
text: [action]: Test [combat] (4) to attempt to retrieve a valuable organ from one of the alien cadavers. This test gets +1 difficulty for each clue on Deconstruction Room. If you succeed, remember that you "dissected an organ."

name: Towers of Pnakotus
text: [action]: Discard any number of cards from your hand. Shuffle your discard pile into your deck and draw cards equal to 1 more than the number of cards you discarded. (Limit once per turn.)

name: The Custodian
text: [reaction] When the investigation phase begins, if you control The Custodian: Each investigator at its location draws 1 card. [action] If The Custodian is not controlled by a player: Parley. Test [intellect] (3) to converse with the library custodian. If you succeed, something about its mannerisms seems familiar to you; place 1 of your clues on it. Then, if there are 1 [per_investigator] clues on it, take control of The Custodian.

name: Keeper of the Great Library
text: Spawn - Great Library. Alert. Aloof. If an investigator has "found the process" or "realized what year it is," Keeper of the Great Library loses aloof and gains hunter.

name: Scientist of Yith
text: Spawn - Laboratory of the Great Race. Aloof. If an investigator has "activated the device" or "dissected an organ," Scientist of Yith loses aloof and gains hunter.

name: Scholar from Yith
text: Prey - Most cards in hand. Forced - When Scholar from Yith attacks you: Discard 2 random cards from your hand. [action] If Scholar from Yith is ready and engaged with you: Parley. Test [intellect] (3) to attempt to pass as a member of the creature's race. If you succeed, draw 1 card and evade Scholar from Yith. If you fail, Scholar from Yith attacks you.

name: Yithian Presence
text: Revelation - Put Yithian Presence into play in your threat area. If there is a [[Yithian]] enemy at your location, you cannot investigate that location or trigger [action] abilities on encounter cards (including this card). [action] Choose and discard 2 cards from your hand: Discard Yithian Presence.

name: Cruel Interrogations
text: Revelation - Put Cruel Interrogations into play in your threat area. If any investigator has "interviewed a subject," take 1 horror and Cruel Interrogations gains surge. You cannot take draw actions. [action]: Test [willpower] (2). If you succeed, discard Cruel Interrogations.

name: Lost Humanity
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (5). For each point you fail by, remove the top card of your deck from the game. If there are less than 10 total cards in your hand, deck and discard pile, you are driven insane.

name: Captive Mind
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (0). Regardless of whether this skill test succeeds or fails, choose and discard all but X cards from your hand. X is your modified skill value for this test.

name: Out of Body Experience
text: Revelation - Shuffle each card from your hand into your deck and draw an equal number of cards. Shuffle Out of Body Experience into your deck.

name: Handcuffs
text: [action] If Handcuffs is not attached to an enemy: Evade. Use only on a [[Humanoid]] enemy. This evasion attempt uses [combat] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, attach Handcuffs to the just-evaded enemy. If the attached enemy is non-[[Elite]], it cannot ready and doom cannot be placed on it.

name: Blood Eclipse
text: As an additional cost to play Blood Eclipse, take up to 3 damage. Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +1 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack for each damage taken as part of this card's cost.

name: Feed the Mind
text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Feed the Mind and spend 1 secret: Test [intellect] (0). For each point you succeed by, draw 1 card. Then, take 1 horror for each card in your hand in excess of your maximum hand size.

name: Colt Vest Pocket
text: Uses (5 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. Forced - At the end of the round: Discard Colt Vest Pocket.

name: Coup de Grâce
text: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. If this effect defeats that enemy, draw 1 card. If it is your turn, end your turn. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: The Skeleton Key
text:
Exceptional. Fast.
[action]: If the Skeleton Key is in your play area, attach it to your location. If it is already attached to your location, detach it and return it to your play area instead.
Set the attached location's shroud value to 1.

name: Mists of R'lyeh
text: Uses (5 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. You get +3 [willpower] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, after evading the chosen enemy, you may move to a connecting location. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this evasion attempt, choose and discard a card from your hand.

name: Winging It
text: You may play Winging It from your discard pile. If you do, shuffle it into your deck after resolving its effects. Investigate. Your location gets -1 shroud for this investigation. (If you played Winging It from your discard pile, discover 1 additional clue if you succeed.)

name: Old Hunting Rifle
text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +3 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack. If a [skull] or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this attack, the rifle jams. (This attack automatically fails. Before you can activate this ability again, you must perform the following ability: "[action]: You clear the jam.")

name: Thermos
text:
Uses (3 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply, exhaust Thermos: Heal 1 damage from an investigator at your location (2 damage instead if he or she has 2 or more physical trauma).
[action] Spend 1 supply, exhaust Thermos: Heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location (2 horror instead if he or she has 2 or more mental trauma).

name: Hemispheric Map
text:
While your current location is connected to at least 2 other locations, you get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect].
While your current location is connected to at least 4 other locations, you get an additional +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect].

name: Timeworn Brand
text: [action] If Timeworn Brand is ready: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. [action] Exhaust Timeworn Brand: Fight. Add your [willpower] to your skill value for this attack. This attack deals +3 damage. If this attack defeats an [[Elite]] enemy, draw 3 cards. (Max once per game.)

name: Fury That Shakes the Earth
text: Forced - After the third doom is placed on this agenda: Find the enemy that is in pursuit with the highest evade value, and spawn it at the location where the investigators began at this depth level.

name: The Red Depths
text: Forced - After any amount of doom is placed on this agenda: Find the enemy that is in pursuit with the highest evade value, and spawn it at the location where the investigators began at this depth level.

name: VENGEANCE
text: Forced - At the end of the 'check doom threshold' step of the mythos phase: The investigators must draw 1 additional encounter card for each doom in play, in player order. Objective - If each investigator is defeated, advance this agenda.

name: Journey to the Nexus
text: [action] If there are no clues on your location: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Objective - At the end of the round, if investigators at Steps of Yoth possess the requisite number of clues, they may advance. (Beware - any investigator who is not at Steps of Yoth will be defeated.)

name: Steps of Yoth
text: [reaction] When adding to the current depth level, if investigators at Steps of Yoth possess 5 [per_investigator] clues as a group, an investigator at Steps of Yoth crosses rope off from his or her supplies: Add 1 additional resource to the current depth level. (Max once per game.)

name: City of the Serpents
text: While City of the Serpents has no clues on it, it is considered to be in the victory display (for the purposes of counting vengeance).

name: Hall of Heresy
text: While an investigator is in Hall of Heresy, it is considered to be in the victory display (for the purposes of counting vengeance).

name: Crumbling Precipice
text: Forced - When you attempt to explore while at Crumbling Precipice: Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, test [agility] (3). If you fail, test [combat] (2). If you fail, you fall to your death and are killed. (If you succeed at any of these tests, you explore as usual.)

name: Caverns of Yoth
text: Forced - After Caverns of Yoth enters play: Place clues on it equal to the current depth level.

name: Forked Path
text: Forced - When you explore while at Forked Path, check your supplies. If you have a map: Continue drawing cards from the exploration deck until you have drawn 2 connecting locations, if able. Put both of those locations into play and choose 1 to move to.

name: Bridge over N'kai
text: Bridge over N'kai gets +1 shroud for each vengeance point in the victory display.

name: Broken Passage
text: Forced - When you explore while at Broken Passage, check your supplies. If you do not have a pickaxe: Place 1 doom on Broken Passage.

name: Abandoned Site
text: X is the current depth level.

name: Bright Canyon
text: Forced - After you enter Bright Canyon, if you are poisoned: Take 1 damage. [action]: Check your supplies. If you have binoculars, discover 2 clues on Bright Canyon. (Group limit once each depth level.)

name: Yig
text:
Hunter. Massive.
Yig gets +6 [per_investigator] health.
Yig cannot be damaged while there is another ready [[Serpent]] enemy at its location.
Each other [[Serpent]] enemy at Yig's location gains alert and retaliate.

name: Pit Warden
text: Spawn - If Yig is in play, spawn Pit Warden at Yig's location. Otherwise, place Pit Warden in the pursuit area. Hunter.

name: Eater of the Depths
text: Spawn - Put a random set-aside location into play and spawn Eater of the Depths there. Hunter. Massive. X is the current depth level.

name: Children of Valusia
text: Revelation - Put Children of Valusia into play next to the agenda deck. Each [[Serpent]] enemy gets +1 fight and +1 evade. Forced - At the end of the round: Discard 1 copy of Children of Valusia from play. (Max once per round.)

name: Lightless Shadow
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (1). This test gets +X difficulty, where X is the current depth level. If you fail, take 2 damage.

name: Bathophobia
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (1). This test gets +X difficulty, where X is the current depth level. If you fail, take 2 horror.

name: Relic of Ages
text: [free] Exhaust Relic of Ages: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (4). If you succeed, remove 1 doom from any card in play. (Max one success per game.)

name: Kerosene
text:
Uses (3 supplies). If Kerosene has no supplies, discard it.
[action] If an enemy was defeated at this location this round, exhaust Kerosene and spend 1 supply: Heal up to 2 horror from among investigators and [[Ally]] assets at your location.

name: Flamethrower
text: Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. The enemy chosen for this attack must be the enemy engaged with you with the highest fight. You get +4 [combat] for this attack. If this attack is successful, instead of its standard damage, you may assign up to 4 damage among enemies engaged with you (any additional damage adds to this total).

name: Vantage Point
text:
Fast. Play after a location enters play or is revealed during an investigator's turn.
Until the end of the active investigator's turn, that location gets -1 shroud. You may move 1 clue to that location from any other location.

name: Pnakotic Manuscripts
text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would perform a skill test during a revelation effect, spend 1 secret: Do not reveal chaos tokens for that test.
[action] Spend 1 secret: Choose an investigator at your location. Do not reveal chaos tokens for the next skill test that investigator performs this round.

name: Borrowed Time
text: Exceptional. [action]: Place 1 resource on Borrowed Time, as a click (to a maximum of 3 clicks on Borrowed Time). Does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Forced - When your turn begins: Remove all clicks from Borrowed Time. You may take that many additional actions this turn.

name: All In
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card for each point you succeeded by, to a maximum of 5. Shuffle each weakness drawn by this effect back into your deck without resolving it.

name: Shards of the Void
text: Seal (0). Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge or release a chaos token sealed here: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. You get +2 [willpower] for this attack for each "0" token sealed on Shards of the Void. For each "0" token revealed during this attack, seal that token on Shards of the Void and this attack deals 1 additional damage.

name: Seal of the Seventh Sign
text: Seal ([auto_fail]). Uses (7 charges). If Seal of the Seventh Sign has no charges, or if it leaves play, remove it from the game. Forced - After a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] token is revealed during any skill test: Remove 1 charge from Seal of the Seventh Sign.

name: Impromptu Barrier
text: You may play Impromptu Barrier from your discard pile. If you do, shuffle it into your deck after resolving its effects. Evade. The chosen enemy gets -1 evade for this evasion attempt. (If you played Impromptu Barrier from your discard pile, you may evade an additional enemy at the same location with evade X or lower. X is the amount you succeed by.)

name: Alter Fate
text:
Fast. Play during any [free] player window.
Choose and discard from play a non-weakness treachery that is not attached to an [[Elite]] enemy.

name: Threads of Time
text: Forced - If an investigator with the Relic of Ages in his or her hand, deck, discard pile, or play area is eliminated: Immediately advance to agenda 3b.

name: Pendulous Threads
text: Forced - If an investigator with the Relic of Ages in his or her hand, deck, discard pile, or play area is eliminated: Immediately advance to agenda 3b.

name: Snapped Threads
text: Forced - If an investigator with the Relic of Ages in his or her hand, deck, discard pile, or play area is eliminated: Immediately advance to agenda 3b.

name: Worlds Beyond
text: Forced - When an enemy would spawn at an empty location and there are no empty locations in play: Reveal cards from the exploration deck until a location is revealed. Put that location into play and spawn that enemy there. Shuffle the exploration deck.

name: Search for the Brotherhood
text: Objective - If an investigator enters A Pocket in Time, advance.

name: The Yithian Relic
text: [action]: Search your deck or discard pile for the Relic of Ages and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. [action] If the Relic of Ages is attached to your location and there are no clues on that location: Take control of the Relic of Ages. Objective - If an investigator controls the Relic of Ages, advance.

name: Mend the Shatter
text: [action] If you are at a [[Shattered]] location with no clues: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3). If you succeed, attach your location facedown to the Relic of Ages. Each investigator and enemy at that location is moved to A Pocket in Time. Objective - If the number of locations attached to the Relic of Ages is equal to 1 plus the number of investigators who started the game, advance.

name: Paradise Lost
text: [action] If you are at a [[Shattered]] location with no clues: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3). If you succeed, attach your location facedown to the Relic of Ages. Each investigator and enemy at that location is moved to A Pocket in Time. Objective - If Valusia is attached to the Relic of Ages, advance.

name: Timelock
text: [action] If you are at a [[Shattered]] location with no clues: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3). If you succeed, attach your location facedown to the Relic of Ages. Each investigator and enemy at that location is moved to A Pocket in Time. Objective - If Pnakotus is attached to the Relic of Ages, advance.

name: Nexus of N'kai
text: Forced - After you move from Nexus of N'kai to an [[Otherworld]] location, or vice versa: Take 1 horror for each clue on that [[Otherworld]] location. [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Do not take horror from the above Forced ability when moving via this effect.

name: Ichtaca
text: Hunter. Retaliate [action]: Parley. Test [intellect] (5) to plead for your life. If a [cultist] symbol is revealed during this test, you automatically succeed. If you fail, Ichtaca attacks you. If you succeed, flip this card over and resolve its text.

name: Alejandro Vela
