text: Alert. Hunter. [action]: Parley. Test [intellect] (5) to plead for your life. If a [tablet] symbol is revealed during this test, you automatically succeed. If you fail, Alejandro Vela attacks you. If you succeed, flip this card over and resolve its text.

name: Yuggoth
text: [action]: Flip a clue on Yuggoth to its doom side. Draw 1 card.

name: Shores of R'lyeh
text: Shores of R'lyeh gets +1 shroud for each doom on each card in Shores of R'lyeh (including itself). Forced - After Shores of R'lyeh enters play: Place 1 doom on it.

name: City of the Unseen
text: Forced - After 1 or more doom is placed on a [[Cultist]] enemy at City of the Unseen: Place 1 additional doom on that enemy.

name: A Pocket in Time
text: Forced - After you move from A Pocket in Time to a [[Shattered]] location, or vice versa: Take 1 damage for each clue on that [[Shattered]] location. [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Do not take damage from the above Forced ability when moving via this effect.

name: Ruins of New York
text: Forced - After Ruins of New York enters play: Put the top card of the lead investigator's deck into play at this location, facedown (2 cards instead if there are 3 or 4 investigators in the game). Treat each of those cards as Flying Polyp enemies with 2 fight, 2 health, 2 evade, 1 damage, and the [[Monster]] trait.

name: Mu
text: While you are at Mu, the first [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol you reveal during each skill test gains: "Reveal another token."

name: Atlantis
text: Forced - After an [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during a skill test at any location: Place 1 doom on Atlantis. Then, if there are 3 or more doom on Atlantis, remove it from the game. Each enemy and investigator that was at Atlantis is defeated.

name: Pnakotus
text: [action] If there are at least 3 [tablet] tokens in the chaos bag or sealed on cards in play: Discover all of the clues on Pnakotus and draw that many cards. (Group limit once per game.)

name: Valusia
text: [action] If there are at least 3 [cultist] tokens in the chaos bag or sealed on cards in play: Heal 2 damage and 2 horror. Set Valusia's shroud to 0 for the remainder of the game. (Group limit once per game.)

name: Plateau of Leng
text: Forced - If you reveal an [elder_thing] symbol during a skill test at Plateau of Leng: Take 1 horror.

name: Formless Spawn
text: Spawn - Nexus of N'kai. Massive. Formless Spawn cannot move or be moved. Formless Spawn gets +1 fight and +1 evade for each doom on each card in Nexus of N'kai (including Nexus of N'Kai).

name: Temporal Devourer
text: Spawn - Farthest [[Shattered]] or [[Extradimensional]] location. If there are no such locations in play, Temporal Devourer gains surge. Hunter. Forced - After Temporal Devourer enters a [[Shattered]] or [[Extradimensional]] location: Place 1 clue on that location (from the token pool).

name: Shattered Ages
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, place 1 clue (from the token pool) on each location other than Nexus of N'kai.

name: Between Worlds
text: Revelation - Put Between Worlds into play as an [[Otherworld]] location with 3 shroud and 1 clue, and move to it. It is connected to the Nexus of N'kai. (If drawn from the exploration deck, this exploration is still considered unsuccessful.) Forced - At the end of the round: Each investigator here takes 1 damage and 1 horror. If there are no investigators in this location, discard it and move each enemy here to Nexus of N'kai.

name: Wracked by Time
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). Each investigator at a [[Shattered]] location must also perform this skill test. Each investigator who fails takes 2 damage. Each asset assigned damage by this effect that is not defeated is shuffled into its owner's deck.

name: Creeping Darkness
text: Revelation - Attach to Nexus of N'kai. Place 1 doom on Creeping Darkness. Formless Spawn gets +1 [per_investigator] health. [action] [action]: Test [willpower] (3) or check your supplies. If you succeed, or if you have torches, Discard Creeping Shadows.

name: Relic of Ages
text: Forced - After you resolve a treachery while exploring: Shuffle that treachery back into the exploration deck instead of discarding it.

name: Into the Ruins Once Again
text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it.

name: The Chamber of Still Remains
text: [action]: Explore. Draw the top card of the exploration deck. If it is a connecting location, put it into play and move to it. Objective - Only investigators in the Chamber of Time may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Moment of Doom
text: Relic of Ages gains: "[action]: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (4). If you succeed, flip a clue controlled by an investigator at your location to its doom side, and place it on your location. Then, deal 3 damage to Yig." Objective - If Yig is defeated, advance.

name: Carolyn Fern
text:
[reaction] After one of your card effects heals horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset: The healed card's controller gains 1 resource.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may heal 1 horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.

name: Joe Diamond
text: Forced - When the investigation phase begins: Reveal the top card of your hunch deck. Until the end of the phase, you may play that card as if it were in your hand, at -2 cost. If it is still revealed at the end of the phase, shuffle it back into your hunch deck. [elder_sign] effect: +1. You may move an [[Insight]] event from your discard pile to the bottom of your hunch deck.

name: Preston Fairmont
text:
Anytime you gain 1 or more resources from a card effect, place them on Family Inheritance instead of in your resource pool.
[elder_sign] effect: +0. You may spend 2 resources to automatically succeed, instead.

name: Diana Stanley
text:
Diana Stanley gets +1 [willpower] for each card beneath her.
[reaction] After a card you own cancels or ignores a card effect or game effect, if there are fewer than 5 cards beneath Diana Stanley: Place that card facedown beneath her. Draw 1 card and gain 1 resource. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may choose a card beneath Diana Stanley and add it to your hand.

name: Rita Young
text:
[reaction] After you evade an enemy: Either deal 1 damage to that enemy, or move to a connecting location. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. Until the end of the round, ignore the limit on the above [reaction] ability.

name: Marie Lambeau
text:
While you have 1 or more doom among cards you control, you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to play [[Spell]] cards or activate [[Spell]] [action] abilities.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may add 1 doom to or remove 1 doom from a card you control.

name: Hypnotic Therapy
text:
Carolyn Fern deck only.
[action] Exhaust Hypnotic Therapy: Test [intellect] (2). If you succeed, heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location. Then, that investigator may draw 1 card.
[reaction] After one of your other card effects heals horror from an investigator, exhaust Hypnotic Therapy: That effect heals 1 additional horror.

name: Rational Thought
text: Revelation - Put Rational Thought into play in your threat area, with 4 horror on it. Horror on Rational Thought may be healed as if it were on Carolyn Fern. If there is no horror on Rational Thought, discard it. You cannot heal horror from cards other than Rational Thought. You cannot gain resources from Carolyn Fern's [reaction] ability.

name: Detective's Colt 1911s
text: Joe Diamond deck only. Uses (4 ammo). Up to 2 [[Tool]] assets you control do not take up hand slots. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats an enemy, you may move an [[Insight]] event from your discard pile to the bottom of your hunch deck.

name: Unsolved Case
text: Place 1 of your clues on the location with the highest shroud. Remove Unsolved Case from the game. Forced - If Unsolved Case would be shuffled into your hunch deck: Add it to your threat area instead. For the remainder of the game, it gains: "Forced - When the game ends: Joe Diamond earns 2 fewer experience for this scenario."

name: Family Inheritance
text: Permanent. Preston Fairmont deck only. [action]: Move all resources from this card to your resource pool. Forced - When your turn begins: Place 4 resources (from the token pool) on this card. Resources on this card may be spent as if they were in your resource pool. Discard all resources from this card at the end of your turn.

name: Lodge "Debts"
text: Remove Lodge "Debts" from the game. Forced - When the game ends or you are eliminated, if Lodge "Debts" is still in your hand: You suffer 1 mental trauma.

name: Twilight Blade
text: Diana Stanley deck only. [action]: Fight.. You may use [willpower] instead of [combat] for this attack. You may play or commit events and skills beneath Diana Stanley as if they were in your hand. As an additional cost to play or commit a card in this way, exhaust Twilight Blade. You cannot trigger Diana Stanley's [reaction] ability while playing or committing a card in this way.

name: Dark Insight
text: Diana Stanley deck only. Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws an encounter card or a weakness. Cancel all of that card's effects and shuffle it back into its deck. (Do not draw a new card to replace it.)

name: Terrible Secret
text: Revelation - If there are no card beneath Diana Stanley, shuffle Terrible Secret back into your deck. Otherwise, for each card beneath Diana Stanley, you must either discard that card or take 1 horror. Cannot be canceled.

name: "I'm done runnin'!"
text: Rita Young deck only. Fast. Play only during your turn. Ready and engage all enemies at your location. For the remainder of your turn, whenever you evade an enemy, instead of exhausting and disengaging from that enemy, you may deal it 1 damage. (All other effects of the successful evasion still apply.)

name: Hoods
text: Prey - Rita Young only. Alert. Hunter. Forced - After you evade Hoods: It attacks you.

name: Mystifying Song
text:
Marie Lambeau deck only.
Fast. Play when the agenda would advance by reaching its doom threshold.
Until the end of the phase, the agenda cannot advance by reaching its doom threshold. Remove Mystifying Song from the game.

name: Baron Samedi
text: Revelation - Put Baron Samedi into play. He cannot leave play while he has less than 3 doom on him. Forced - When any amount of damage is placed on an investigator in Baron Samedi's location: Place 1 additional damage on that investigator. [free] Exhaust Baron Samedi: Place 1 doom on Baron Samedi. If he has 3 or more doom on him, discard him.

name: Interrogate
text: Parley. Choose a [[Humanoid]] enemy at your location and test [combat] (3). This test gets +X difficulty, where X is the chosen enemy's damage value. If you succeed, discover 1 clue at your location and 1 clue at any other location.

name: Delay the Inevitable
text: Fast. Play only during your turn. Attach to an investigator at your location, under his or her control. [reaction] When you are dealt damage and/or horror: Discard Delay the Inevitable and cancel all damage and/or horror just dealt. Forced - When the mythos phase ends: You must either spend 2 resources or discard Delay the Inevitable.

name: Steadfast
text: While you have 5 or more total remaining health and sanity, Steadfast gains [willpower] [combat] (while you have 10 or more total remaining health and sanity, Steadfast gains [willpower] [willpower] [combat] [combat], instead).

name: Ace of Swords
text:
You get +1 [combat].
[reaction] When the game begins, if Ace of Swords is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: Fingerprint Kit
text: Uses (3 supplies). [action] Exhaust Fingerprint Kit and spend 1 supply: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation. If you succeed, you discover 1 additional clue at your location.

name: Connect the Dots
text:
Fast. Play after you discover the last clue at your location.
Discover 2 clues at a location with a lower printed shroud value than your location.

name: Curiosity
text: While you have 4 or more cards in hand, Curiosity gains [willpower] [intellect] (while you have 7 or more cards in hand, Curiosity gains [willpower] [willpower] [intellect] [intellect], instead).

name: Death • XIII
text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] When the game begins, if Death • XIII is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: Well Connected
text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
[fast] Exhaust Well Connected: You get +1 skill value for this skill test for every 5 resources you have.

name: Money Talks
text:
Fast. Play when you initiate a skill test.
Instead of the skill type indicated for this test ([willpower], [intellect], [combat], or [agility]), this is a resource skill test. Your base skill value for this test is equal to half the number of resources in your resource pool (rounded down).

name: Cunning
text: While you have 5 or more resources, Cunning gains [intellect] [agility] (while you have 10 or more resources, Cunning gains [intellect] [intellect] [agility] [agility], instead).

name: The Moon • XVIII
text:
You get +1 [agility].
[reaction] When the game begins, if The Moon • XVIII is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: Deny Existence
text: Fast. Play when an encounter card or an enemy attack would cause you to do one of the following (choose one): Discard cards from hand, lose resources, lose actions, take damage, or take horror. You ignore that aspect of the effect. (Each other aspect resolves normally.)

name: Eldritch Inspiration
text:
Fast. Play when you would resolve an effect on a [mystic] card that triggers "when," "if," or "after" a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed.
Either cancel that effect, or resolve it an additional time.

name: Prophesy
text: While there are 3 or more doom in play, Prophesy gains [wild] (while there are 6 or more doom in play, Prophesy gains [wild] [wild], instead).

name: Four of Cups
text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] When the game begins, if Four of Cups is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: Track Shoes
text:
Limit 1 [[Footwear]] per investigator.
You get +1 [agility].
[reaction] After you move, but before enemies at your new location engage you, exhaust Track Shoes: Test [agility] (3). If you succeed, move to a connecting location.

name: Act of Desperation
text: As an additional cost to play Act of Desperation, choose and discard an [[Item]] asset that takes up at least 1 hand slot from your hand or play area. Fight. You get +X [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack, where X is the chosen asset's printed resource cost. If you succeed and that asset was in your play area, gain X resources.

name: Able Bodied
text: While you control 2 or fewer [[Item]] assets, Able Bodied gains [combat] [agility] (while you control 1 or fewer [[Item]] assets, Able Bodied gains [combat] [combat] [agility] [agility], instead).

name: Five of Pentacles
text:
You get +1 health and +1 sanity.
[reaction] When the game begins, if Five of Pentacles is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: Ace of Rods
text:
[fast] During your turn, remove Ace of Rods from the game: You may take an additional action this turn, during which you get +2 to each of your skills.
[reaction] When the game begins, if Ace of Rods is in your opening hand: Put it into play.

name: The 13th Vision
text: Revelation - Put The 13th Vision into play in your threat area. Investigators at your location fail ties during skill tests. [action] [action]: Discard The 13th Vision.

name: The Tower • XVI
text: You cannot commit cards to skill tests while The Tower • XVI is in your hand. If The Tower • XVI is drawn in your opening hand during setup (before or after taking a mulligan), you cannot replace it. It must stay in your opening hand.

name: JUDGEMENT • XX
text: Forced - After doom is placed on any card: Each investigator must either take 1 damage or 1 horror (2 damage or 2 horror instead if there is 5 or more doom in play). Forced - When any investigator is defeated, that investigator must advance this agenda. Do not remove any doom from this agenda when it advances.

name: The Disappearance
text: Forced - When an investigator is eliminated: Place each of that investigator's clues on this act instead of his or her location. Objective - Discover as many clues as you can before your inevitable demise.

name: Gavriella Mizrah
text:
[reaction] After an enemy attacks you, even if that attack was canceled: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Heal 1 damage and 1 horror.

name: Jerome Davids
text:
[reaction] When an investigator at your location draws a treachery from the encounter deck, discard cards from your hand with a total of at least 2 [intellect] icons: Cancel that card's revelation effect. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Valentino Rivas
text:
[free] During a skill test you are performing, spend 2 resources: Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Gain 2 resources.

name: Penny White
text:
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test during a revelation effect: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If this is a skill test during a revelation effect, you may take an additional action during your next turn.

name: The Night Howls
text: Forced - At the end of the round: Place 1 doom on this agenda for each [[Witch]] enemy at the Witches' Circle.

name: Lost in the Woods
text: Locations in front of you are connected to one another. You cannot enter locations in front of other investigators. Objective - At the end of the round, investigators may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Witch Hauntings
text: Locations in front of you are connected to one another. You cannot enter locations in front of other investigators. Objective - If a single investigator spends the requisite number of clues, advance.

name: Paths into Twilight
text: Locations in front of you are connected to one another.

name: Witches' Circle
text: Revelation - Put the Witches' Circle into play in the center of the play area, in front of none of the investigators. The lead investigator spawns the set-aside Anette Mason at the Witches' Circle. Forced - After the enemy phase begins: Move each ready, unengaged [[Witch]] enemy once toward the Witches' Circle.

name: A Circle Unbroken
text: Locations in front of you are connected to one another. Objective - If Anette Mason is defeated, advance. Objective - If there are no clues on the Witches' Circle, advance.

name: Anette Mason
text: Retaliate. Forced - After the enemy phase begins: Discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Spawn each [[Witch]] enemy discarded by this effect at Anette Mason's location. If no [[Witch]] enemies are discarded by this effect, ready her.

name: Witch-Haunted Woods
text:
You cannot investigate this location while you have between 3 and 10 resources.
[free]: Choose an investigator at a different Witch-Haunted Woods. Move up to 3 of your resources to that investigator's resource pool, or vice versa. (Group limit once per round.)

name: Witch-Haunted Woods
text: Forced - After any number of clues are discovered from this location: Each investigator at this location loses an equal number of resources.

name: Witch-Haunted Woods
text:
You cannot investigate this location while you have between 3 and 5 cards in hand.
[free]: You choose and discard 1 card from your hand, then an investigator at a different Witch-Haunted Woods draws 1 card, or vice versa. (Limit once per round.)

name: Witch-Haunted Woods
text: Forced - When the last clue is discovered from this location: Spawn the topmost enemy in the encounter discard pile at this location. (If there are no enemies in the encounter discard pile, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded, and spawn that enemy instead.)

name: Witch-Haunted Woods
text: Investigators at other Witch-Haunted Woods locations can commit 1 card to each skill test performed at this location, and vice versa.

name: Witch-Haunted Woods
text: Forced - After any number of clues are discovered from this location: Each investigator at this location must discard an equal number of cards at random from his or her hand.

name: Witch-Haunted Woods
text: [reaction] When an enemy would spawn at a different Witch-Haunted Woods: Spawn it at this location instead. Then, it makes an immediate attack against each investigator at this location.

name: JUSTICE • XI
text: [[Silver Twilight]] enemies cannot be damaged or defeated. Forced - When you draw a [[Monster]] enemy: Instead of spawning it, set it aside, out of play, and place 1 doom on this agenda. This effect can cause this agenda to advance.

name: Over the Threshold
text: Each [[Silver Twilight]] enemy gains Victory 0, and counts as an investigator for the purpose of determining where hunter enemies move during the enemy phase. Forced - After the 'hunter enemies move' step of the enemy phase: Each ready [[Spectral]] enemy deals its damage value to each [[Humanoid]] enemy at its location.

name: Hidden Agendas
text: Objective - Find information about the disappearances by discovering as many clues as you can. (Do not advance until you are instructed.) (Hint: it may be worthwhile to investigate the last known locations of the missing persons.)

name: Escape the Cage
text: Forced - At the end of the round: Each [[Silver Twilight]] enemy in the Entry Hall escapes; place them beneath the Entry Hall, out of play. Move each ready [[Silver Twilight]] enemy with the aloof keyword once toward the Entry Hall. Objective - If each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

name: Entry Hall
text: [action]: Resign. "I guess there is nothing to those disappearances after all."

name: Victorian Halls
text: [action]: You go looking for trouble. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Silver Twilight]] enemy is discarded. Spawn that enemy in the Victorian Halls. Then, gain 2 clues (from the token pool). (Group limit once per game.)

name: Trophy Room
text: [action]: You spend some time schmoozing with the other guests. Either gain 2 resources, or spend 2 resources to gain 1 clue (from the token pool). (Limit once per round.)

name: Billiards Room
text: [action]: Test [agility] (3) to compete with the other guests. If you succeed, gain 1 clue (from the token pool). (Limit once per round.)

name: Master Bedroom
text: Forced - When the round ends, if there is at least 1 investigator in the Master Bedroom: Place 1 doom on the nearest [[Silver Twilight]] enemy.

name: Balcony
text: [action] Discard cards from your hand with a total of at least 3 [intellect] icons: Parley. The guest here knows more about the Lodge than they let on. Gain 2 clues (from the token pool). (Group limit once per game.)

name: Office
text: Each [[Silver Twilight]] enemy in the Office lose aloof. Forced - If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol while investigating the Office: Place 1 doom on the nearest [[Silver Twilight]] enemy.

name: Entry Hall
text: [action]: Resign. You tear through the front doors of the manor, escaping the spectral realm and leaving the remainder of the survivors to their fate.

name: Victorian Halls
text: Haunted - Lose 1 action.

name: Trophy Room
text: Haunted - Lose 2 resources. For each resource you cannot lose from this effect, take 1 horror.

name: Billiards Room
text: Haunted - You must either discard an asset you control or take 1 damage.

name: Master Bedroom
text: Haunted - Place 1 of your clues on Master Bedroom.

name: Balcony
text: Haunted - Each of your cards with health takes 1 direct damage.

name: Office
text: Haunted - Choose and discard a card from your hand.

name: Josef Meiger
text: Retaliate. [action] If no other [[Silver Twilight]] enemy has doom on it: Parley. Test [intellect] (4) to convince Josef that this is not your doing. If you fail, Josef Meiger attacks you. If you succeed, flip this card over and resolve its text.

name: The Spectral Watcher
text: Alert. Hunter. Forced - When The Spectral Watcher is defeated: Instead of discarding it, heal all damage from it, disengage it from all investigators, and exhaust it. It does not ready during the upkeep phase this round.

name: Watcher's Grasp
text: Revelation - Heal 3 damage from The Spectral Watcher. Ready The Spectral Watcher. It moves, engages, and attacks as if it were the enemy phase. Throughout the resolution of this effect, The Spectral Watcher gains "Prey - You."

name: Piper of Azathoth
text: Prey - Least remaining sanity. Alert. Hunter. Retaliate. Forced - When the enemy phase ends: Piper of Azathoth attacks each investigator it is not engaged with at its location (regardless of whether it is ready or exhausted).

name: Daemonic Piping
text: Surge. Revelation - If Piper of Azathoth is in play, deal 1 horror to each investigator at its location and at each connecting location. Otherwise, put Daemonic Piping into play next to the agenda deck. If there are 3 copies of Daemonic Piping in play, discard them and spawn the Piper of Azathoth engaged with its prey (from any out of play area).

name: Coven Initiate
text: Revelation - Discard the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. If this effect causes the encounter deck to run out of cards, draw the topmost [[Hex]] card in the encounter discard pile.

name: Priestess of the Coven
text: Retaliate. Priestess of the Coven gets +1 fight and +1 evade for each [[Witch]] enemy in the encounter discard pile (to a maximum of +3 fight and +3 evade). Forced - When the encounter deck runs out of cards: Priestess of the Coven readies and attacks each investigator at its location.

name: Diabolic Voices
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). For each point you fail by, discard 1 random card from your hand. For each card you cannot discard, take 1 horror or 1 damage. This test gets +1 difficulty for each copy of Diabolic Voices in the encounter discard pile.

name: Wracked
text: Revelation - Put Wracked into play in your threat area. You get -1 to each of your skills during the first skill test you perform each round. [action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Wracked. If there is an exhausted [[Witch]] enemy at your location, this test is automatically successful.

name: Bedeviled
text: Revelation - Put Bedeviled into play in your threat area. You cannot trigger [action] abilities on cards you control. [action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Bedeviled. If there is an exhausted [[Witch]] enemy at your location, this test is automatically successful.

name: Lodge Neophyte
text: Spawn - Any empty location. Aloof. Forced - After Lodge Neophyte enters play: Place 1 doom on it. [action]: Parley. Test [willpower] (2). If you succeed, remove all doom from Lodge Neophyte.

name: Keeper of Secrets
text: Spawn - Any empty location. Aloof. Retaliate. Forced - When the mythos phase ends: Place 1 doom on Keeper of Secrets. [action]: Parley. Test [intellect] (3). If you succeed, remove all doom from Keeper of Secrets.

name: Mysteries of the Lodge
text: Revelation - Place 1 doom on the nearest [[Cultist]] enemy. Then, until the end of the round, increase the difficulty to fight, evade, or parley with that enemy by 2. If no doom is placed by this effect, Mysteries of the Lodge gains surge.

name: Evil Past
text: Revelation - Put Evil Past into play in your threat area if there is no copy of it in your threat area (if there is, discard Evil Past and it gains surge instead). Forced - When the encounter deck runs out of cards: Take 2 horror and test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Evil Past.

name: Centuries of Secrets
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (5). For each point you fail by, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If a [[Curse]] treachery is discarded by this effect, deal 1 direct damage to your investigator and to each of your [[Ally]] assets.

name: Nether Mist
text: Prey - Investigator at the location with the most clues. Aloof. Hunter. Nether Mist's location gains: "Haunted - Nether Mist attacks you."

name: Shadow Hound
text: Prey - Lowest [agility]. Hunter. Retaliate. Forced - After Shadow Hound attacks you: Resolve each haunted ability on your location.

name: Whispers in the Dark
text: Revelation - Put Whispers in the Dark into play next to the agenda deck. Each location gains: "Haunted - Take 1 horror." Forced - When the round ends: Discard Whispers in the Dark.

name: Wraith
text: Hunter. Forced - When Wraith is defeated by damage (except from a [[Spell]] or [[Relic]]): Instead of discarding it, attach it to its location. Attached location gains: "Haunted - Spawn Wraith at this location."

name: Trapped Spirits
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (3). For each point you fail by, take 1 damage. If your location is haunted, as an additional cost for an investigator to commit 1 or more cards to this skill test, he or she must resolve each haunted ability on this location.

name: Realm of Torment
text: Revelation - Put Realm of Torment into play in your threat area. Forced - When your turn begins: Resolve each haunted ability on your location. Forced - When your turn ends: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Realm of Torment.

name: Shapes in the Mist
text: Surge. Revelation - Resolve each haunted ability on your location.

name: Terror in the Night
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, put Terror in the Night into play next to the agenda deck. If you fail by 3 or more, Terror in the Night gains surge. If there are 3 copies of Terror in the Night next to the agenda deck, discard them and each investigator takes 3 horror.

name: Fate of All Fools
text: Peril. Revelation - You must decide (choose one): - If there is no other copy of Fate of All Fools in play, put Fate of All Fools into play in your threat area. - An investigator with another copy of Fate of All Fools in his or her threat area takes 2 direct damage. - Place 1 doom on another copy of Fate of All Fools.

name: Something Worth Fighting For
text: Something Worth Fighting For may be assigned horror dealt to other investigators at your location.

name: Crack the Case
text:
Fast. Play after an investigator discovers the last remaining clue at your location.
Investigators at that location gain a total of X resources, distributed as you wish. X is that location's shroud value.

name: Intel Report
text:
Discover 1 clue at your location.
[reaction] When you play Intel Report, increase its cost by 2: Change "Discover 1 clue" to "Discover 2 clues."
[reaction] When you play Intel Report, increase its cost by 2: Change "at your location" to "at a location up to 2 connections away."

name: Sign Magick
text:
Fast.
You have 1 additional arcane slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Spell]] or [[Ritual]] asset.

name: Banish
text: Evade. Use only on a non-[[Elite]] enemy. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, move the enemy just evaded to any location in play. If you succeed and a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol was revealed during this evasion attempt, that enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: Meat Cleaver
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack (+2 [combat] instead if you have 3 or fewer remaining sanity). If this attack defeats an enemy, you may heal 1 horror. As an additional cost to initiate this ability, you may take 1 horror to have this attack deal +1 damage.

name: .45 Thompson
text: Uses (5 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Scroll of Secrets
text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Scroll of Secrets and spend 1 secret: Look at the bottom card of any investigator's deck or the encounter deck. Then, either discard that card, add it to its owner's hand, place it on the bottom of its deck, or place it on the top of its deck.

name: Tennessee Sour Mash
text: Uses (2 supplies). [fast] Exhaust Tennessee Sour Mash and spend 1 supply: You get +2 [willpower] for a skill test on a treachery card. [action] Discard Tennessee Sour Mash: Fight. You get +3 [combat] for this attack.

name: Enchanted Blade
text: Uses (3 charges). [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. As an additional cost to initiate this ability, you may spend 1 charge to empower the blade. If you do, you get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Grisly Totem
text: [reaction] After you commit a card to a skill test, exhaust Grisly Totem: That card gains another instance of one of its skill icons of your choice.

name: THE HERMIT • IX
text:
Each non-weakness enemy gets +1 health.
[reaction] After you defeat Brown Jenkin or Nahab: Gain 1 clue from the token bank (2 clues instead if there are 3 or more investigators in the game).

name: The Familiar
text:
Each non-weakness enemy gets +2 health.
[reaction] After you defeat Brown Jenkin or Nahab: Gain 1 clue from the token bank (2 clues instead if there are 3 or more investigators in the game).

name: The Witch Light
text:
Each non-weakness enemy gets +3 health.
[reaction] After you defeat Brown Jenkin or Nahab: Gain 1 clue from the token bank (2 clues instead if there are 3 or more investigators in the game).

name: Marked for Sacrifice
text:
Each non-weakness enemy gets +4 health.
[reaction] After you defeat Brown Jenkin or Nahab: Gain 1 clue (2 clues instead if there are 3 or more investigators in the game).

name: Investigating the Witch House
text: Objective - If each undefeated investigator is in Walter Gilman's Room, investigators may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Beyond the Witch House
text: Objective - Only investigators in the Witch House Ruins may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

name: Stopping the Ritual
text: Nahab cannot leave the Site of the Sacrifice. Forced - When Nahab is defeated: Instead of discarding her, heal all damage from her, disengage her from all investigators, and exhaust her. She does not ready during the upkeep phase this round. Objective - If there is no doom on Nahab, advance.

name: Moldy Halls
text: Haunted - Lose 3 resources.

name: Landlord's Quarters
text: Forced - After you reveal Landlord's Quarters: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Swarm of Rats and spawn it in Moldy Halls. Shuffle the encounter deck. Haunted - Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Swarm of Rats and spawn it in Moldy Halls. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Joe Mazurewicz's Room
text: [action]: Search your deck for a [[Blessed]] or [[Item]] asset and add it to your hand. (Group limit once per game.) Haunted - You must either take 1 horror, or choose and discard an asset you control.

name: Frank Elwood's room
text: Haunted - You must either place 1 of your clues on Frank Elwood's Room, or place 1 doom on the current agenda.

name: Walter Gilman's Room
text: [action]: Draw 3 cards and take 1 horror. (Limit once per game.) Haunted - Discard the top 2 cards of the encounter deck.

name: Keziah's Room
text: [reaction] After you successfully investigate Keziah's Room: Instead of discovering clues, put the top card of the Unknown Places deck into play, unrevealed. Then, you may move to that location. Haunted - Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Hex]] card is discarded. Draw that card.

name: Moldy Halls
text: [action]: You request aid from your past self. Each investigator at this location may return 1 card from his or her discard pile to his or her hand. Each investigator who does so remembers that he or she "meddled with the past." (Group limit once per game.)

name: Twilight Abyss
text: Forced - After you enter Twilight Abyss, test [combat] or [agility] (3). For each point you fail by, take 1 damage.

name: City of Elder Things
text: [reaction] After you reveal City of Elder Things, take 2 horror: Put the top card of the Unknown Places deck into play, unrevealed. For the remainder of the scenario, City of Elder Things is considered to be connected to that location, and vice versa.

name: Witch House Ruins
text: [action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, heal 2 horror. (Limit once per game.) Haunted - Lose 1 action.

name: Salem Gaol, 1692
text: [action]: Test [intellect] (3). If you succeed, move to any revealed location. (Limit once per game.) Haunted- Move to Keziah's Room.

name: Physics Classroom
text: [reaction] After you successfully investigate Physics Classroom by 2 or more: Discover a clue at another revealed location. (Limit once per round.)

name: Court of the Great Old Ones
text: Forced - After you enter Court of the Great Old Ones, test [willpower] (3). For each point you fail by, take 1 horror. Haunted - The next action you perform this round must be an investigate action.

name: Site of the Sacrifice
text: [action] Investigators at this location spend 1 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Remove 1 doom from Nahab. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity from Nahab. Forced - At the end of the round: Add clues to this location until it has 3 [per_investigator] clues on it. Haunted - You must either place 1 doom on Nahab, or Nahab attacks you.

name: Strange Geometry
text: Revelation - Put Strange Geometry into play and move to it. Forced - After the investigation phase ends: Discard Strange Geometry and move each investigator and enemy here to the location with the most clues. Each investigator who moved by this effect takes 1 damage and 1 horror. [free] If Strange Geometry has no clues on it: Move to any revealed location.

name: Meddlesome Familiar
text: Revelation - If Brown Jenkin is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for him, spawn him at your location, and take 1 damage. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Swarm of Rats, spawn it engaged with you, then take 1 damage.

name: Ghostly Presence
text: Revelation - If Nahab is in play, ready her, resolve her hunter keyword, and she attacks each investigator at her location. If Nahab is at the Site of the Sacrifice, place 1 doom on her, as well. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Nahab and spawn her at your location.

name: Extradimensional Visions
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (2). This test gets +1 difficulty for every 10 cards in the encounter discard pile. If you fail, discard an asset you control.

name: Pulled by the Stars
text: Revelation - Put Pulled by the Stars into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you did not move at least once during your turn: Take 2 horror. [action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Pulled by the Stars from play. If there is an exhausted [[Witch]] enemy at your location, this test is automatically successful.

name: Disquieting Dreams
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (5). If you fail, put Disquieting Dreams into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of your turn: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. Forced - When the encounter deck runs out of cards: Discard Disquieting Dreams and reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. Draw each weakness revealed and discard each other revealed card.

name: Brown Jenkin
text: Aloof. Hunter. Each ready [[Creature]] enemy gets +2 fight. Forced - When the enemy phase ends, if Brown Jenkin is ready: Each investigator at his location discards his or her hand, then draws that many cards.

name: Nahab
text: Hunter. Retaliate. Do not remove doom from Nahab when the agenda advances. Nahab gets +X fight, where X is the number of the current agenda. Forced - After the enemy phase begins, if Nahab is ready: Place 1 doom on her.

name: The Black Book
text:
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect].
[reaction] When you play a card, exhaust The Black Book and take X horror: Reduce that card's cost by X.

name: Alice Luxley
text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you discover a clue, exhaust Alice Luxley: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: Well-Maintained
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Attach to an [[Item]] asset you control. Limit 1 per asset.
[reaction] After attached asset is discarded: Return it to its owner's hand, along with each other [[Upgrade]] attachment that was attached to it.

name: Mr. "Rook"
text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[free] Exhaust Mr. "Rook" and spend 1 secret: Search the top 3, 6, or 9 cards of your deck for any card and draw it. If at least 1 weakness is among the searched cards, draw 1 of them, as well. Shuffle your deck.

name: Hawk-Eye Folding Camera
text: [reaction] After the last clue is discovered from your location: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on this card, as evidence. (Limit once per game at each location.) While Hawk-Eye Folding Camera has ... - ... 1 or more evidence, you get +1 [willpower]. - ... 2 or more evidence, you get +1 [intellect]. - ... 3 or more evidence, you get +1 sanity.

name: Henry Wan
text:
[action] Exhaust Henry Wan: One at a time, reveal random tokens from the chaos bag until you choose to stop, or until you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol.
- If you chose to stop, for each token revealed via this effect, you may either draw 1 card or gain 1 resource.
- If you revealed a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, do nothing.

name: Swift Reflexes
text:
Fast. Play during any investigator's turn, except during an action.
Immediately take an action as if it were your turn. This action does not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn.

name: Wither
text: [action]: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during this attack, the attacked enemy gets -1 fight and -1 evade for the remainder of the turn (to a minimum of 1).

name: Sixth Sense
text: [action]: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during this test, you may choose a revealed location connected to your location; you are now investigating as if you were at the chosen location instead of your location (you may use either shroud value).

name: Drawing Thin
text: [reaction] When you initiate a skill test, exhaust Drawing Thin: Increase the difficulty of this skill test by 2. Gain 2 resources or draw 1 card.

name: Belly of the Beast
text:
Fast. Play after you successfully evade an enemy by 2 or more.
Discover 1 clue at that enemy's location.

name: Death's Approach
text: Locations cannot be flipped to their non-[[Spectral]] side.

name: In Pursuit of the Dead
text: Locations cannot be flipped to their [[Spectral]] side.

name: In Pursuit of the Living
text: [free]: Flip your location over. (Group limit once per round at each location.) Clues cannot be discovered at non-[[Spectral]] locations. Objective - Banish as many Heretics as you can. If there are 4 copies of Unfinished Business in the victory display, advance.

name: Hangman's Brook
text: [action]: Resign. "Whose bright idea was this, anyway?"

name: Hangman's Brook
text: [action]: Resign. "Whose bright idea was this, anyway?" Haunted - Take 1 damage. Until the end of the round, the above resign ability cannot be triggered.

name: Haunted Fields
text: Each [[Spectral]] enemy at Haunted Fields gets +1 horror value.

name: Haunted Fields
text: Each [[Spectral]] enemy at Haunted Fields gets +1 horror value. Haunted - Move the nearest [[Spectral]] enemy once toward Haunted Fields.

name: Abandoned Chapel
text: During the mythos phase, each investigator in Abandoned Chapel gets -1 to each skill.

name: Abandoned Chapel
text: During the mythos phase, each investigator in Abandoned Chapel gets -1 to each skill. Haunted - Until the end of the round, you get -1 to each skill.

name: The Gallows
text: The Gallows gets +1 shroud for each [[Witch]] enemy in play.

name: The Gallows
text: The Gallows gets +1 shroud for each [[Witch]] enemy in play. Haunted - Discard the top 3 cards of the standard encounter deck. If a [[Witch]] enemy is discarded by this effect, draw it.

name: The Gallows
text: X is the number of [[Geist]] enemies in play.

name: The Gallows
text: X is the number of [[Geist]] enemies in play. Haunted - Discard the top 3 cards of the spectral encounter deck. If a [[Geist]] enemy is discarded by this effect, draw it.

name: Heretics' Graves
text: While investigating Heretics' Graves, add your [willpower] value to your skill value for the investigation.

name: Heretics' Graves
text: While investigating Heretics' Graves, add your [willpower] value to your skill value for the investigation. Haunted - Reduce your base [willpower] to 1 until the end of your next turn.

name: Heretics' Graves
text: Forced - After a [[Witch]] enemy at Heretics' Graves is defeated: Discard the top 2 cards of the standard encounter deck.

name: Heretics' Graves
text: Forced - After a [[Witch]] enemy at Heretics' Graves is defeated: Discard the top 2 cards of the standard encounter deck. Haunted - Heal 1 damage from each Heretic and each [[Witch]] enemy in play.

name: Chapel Crypt
text: While there are no ready enemies at Chapel Crypt, it gets -3 shroud.

name: Chapel Crypt
text: While there are no ready enemies at Chapel Crypt, it gets -3 shroud. Haunted - Spawn the top card of your deck facedown, engaged with you. Treat that card as a Reanimated Dead enemy with 1 fight, 1 health, 1 evade, 1 damage, and the [[Monster]] trait.

name: Chapel Crypt
text: While there are no [[Hex]] treacheries among investigators' threat areas at Chapel Crypt, it gets -3 shroud.

name: Chapel Crypt
text: While there are no [[Hex]] treacheries among investigators' threat areas at Chapel Crypt, it gets -3 shroud. Haunted - Find the topmost [[Hex]] treachery in the standard encounter discard pile and put it into play in your threat area.

name: Chapel Attic
text: Forced - After you draw a non-weakness card from your deck while at Chapel Attic: Place that card facedown beneath Chapel Attic, out of play. [reaction] After you successfully investigate Chapel Attic: Add each card beneath it to its owner's hand.

name: Chapel Attic
text: Forced - After you draw a non-weakness card from your deck while at Chapel Attic: Place that card facedown beneath Chapel Attic, out of play. [reaction] After you successfully investigate Chapel Attic: Add each card beneath it to its owner's hand. Haunted - Discard a random card from beneath Chapel Attic.

name: Chapel Attic
text: While investigating Chapel Attic, add the number of cards in your hand to your skill value for the investigation.

name: Chapel Attic
text: While investigating Chapel Attic, add the number of cards in your hand to your skill value for the investigation. Haunted - Discard a random card from your hand (2 cards instead of you have 5 or more cards in hand).

name: Spectral Web
text: [action] Investigators at your location spend 1-3 clues, as a group: Fight. Use this ability only to attack a [[Geist]] enemy. You may choose to use your [willpower] instead of your [combat] for this attack. You get +X skill value and deal +X damage for this attack, where X is the amount of clues spent to trigger this ability.

name: Heretic
text: Heretic gets +2 [per_investigator] health. While Heretic is at a non-[[Spectral]] location, it gains aloof and cannot be engaged or damaged. [free] Spend 1 clue: Parley. Look at Heretic's other side (without resolving its text). Forced - After Heretic is defeated: Flip it over and resolve the text on its other side.

name: Heretic
text: Heretic gets +2 [per_investigator] health. While Heretic is at a non-[[Spectral]] location, it gains aloof and cannot be engaged or damaged. [free] Spend 1 clue: Parley. Look at Heretic's other side (without resolving its text). Forced - After Heretic is defeated: Flip it over and resolve the text on its other side.

name: Heretic

Look at Heretic's other side (without resolving its text). Forced - After Heretic is defeated: Flip it over and resolve the text on its other side.

name: Heretic
text: Heretic gets +2 [per_investigator] health. While Heretic is at a non-[[Spectral]] location, it gains aloof and cannot be engaged or damaged. [free] Spend 1 clue: Parley. Look at Heretic's other side (without resolving its text). Forced - After Heretic is defeated: Flip it over and resolve the text on its other side.

name: Heretic
text: Heretic gets +2 [per_investigator] health. While Heretic is at a non-[[Spectral]] location, it gains aloof and cannot be engaged or damaged. [free] Spend 1 clue: Parley. Look at Heretic's other side (without resolving its text). Forced - After Heretic is defeated: Flip it over and resolve the text on its other side.

name: Heretic
text: Heretic gets +2 [per_investigator] health. While Heretic is at a non-[[Spectral]] location, it gains aloof and cannot be engaged or damaged. [free] Spend 1 clue: Parley. Look at Heretic's other side (without resolving its text). Forced - After Heretic is defeated: Flip it over and resolve the text on its other side.

name: Vengeful Witch
text: Spawn - The Gallows or Heretics' Graves. Alert. Hunter. Forced - When Vengeful Witch is defeated: Deal its damage and horror to each investigator at its location, as direct damage/horror.

name: Malevolent Spirit
text: Spawn - Chapel Attic or Chapel Crypt. While Malevolent Spirit is at a [[Spectral]] location, it gains hunter and gets +1 damage value and +1 horror value. Forced - When Malevolent Spirit is defeated by damage (except from a [[Spell]] or [[Relic]]): Instead of discarding it, heal all damage from it, exhaust it, and move it to any [[Spectral]] location, if able.

name: Punishment
text: Revelation - Put Punishment into play in your threat area. Forced - After an enemy at any location is defeated: Take 1 damage. [action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Punishment. If there is an exhausted [[Witch]] enemy at your location, this test is automatically successful.

name: Burdens of the Past
text: Revelation - If there are no copies of Unfinished Business in your threat area, Burdens of the Past gains surge. Otherwise, trigger the forced ability of each copy of Unfinished Business in your threat area as if it were the end of the round.

name: Ominous Portents
text: Peril. Revelation - You must either (choose one): - Draw the top card of the spectral encounter deck. That card gains peril, and its effects cannot be canceled. - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail take 2 horror.

name: Grave-Light
text: Revelation - If Grave-Light is drawn ... - ...from the standard encounter deck, shuffle it into the spectral encounter deck, and it gains surge. - ...from the spectral encounter deck, take 2 damage and place it in the standard encounter discard pile.

name: Bane of the Living
text: Peril. Revelation - You must either (choose one): - Choose an Unfinished Business card in play, flip it to its Heretic side, and place damage on it equal to half its health. - Discard cards from the top of the spectral encounter deck until a [[Geist]] enemy is discarded. Spawn that enemy engaged with you.

name: .45 Thompson
text: Uses (5 ammo). Ammo spent from .45 Thompson is placed in your resource pool, as resources. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: .45 Thompson
text: Uses (5 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you succeed by at least X, you may spend 1 ammo to deal this attack's damage to another enemy at your location, where X is that enemy's fight value.

name: Scroll of Secrets
text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Scroll of Secrets and spend 1 secret: Look at the bottom 3 cards of any investigator's deck or the encounter deck. You may discard 1 of those cards. You may add 1 of those cards to its owner's hand. Place the rest of those cards on either the top or bottom of their deck, in any order.

name: Scroll of Secrets
text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Scroll of Secrets and spend 1 secret: Look at the top or bottom card of any investigator's deck or the encounter deck. Then, either discard that card, add it to its owner's hand, place it on the bottom of its deck, or place it on top of its deck.

name: Tennessee Sour Mash
text: Fast. Uses (2 supplies). [fast] Exhaust Tennessee Sour Mash and spend 1 supply: You get +3 [willpower] for a skill test on a treachery card. [action] Discard Tennessee Sour Mash: Fight. You get +3 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Tennessee Sour Mash
text: Uses (3 supplies). [fast] Exhaust Tennessee Sour Mash and spend 1 supply: You get +2 [willpower] for a skill test on a treachery card. [action] Discard Tennessee Sour Mash: Fight. You get +3 [combat] for this attack. If this attack succeeds against a non-[[Elite]] enemy, automatically evade it.

name: Enchanted Blade
text: Uses (3 charges). [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed, you may spend 1 charge to empower the blade, dealing +1 damage for this attack. If the blade is empowered and this attack defeats an enemy, draw 1 card and heal 1 horror.

name: Enchanted Blade
text: Uses (4 charges). [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. As an additional cost to use this ability, you may spend up to 2 charges to empower the blade (for each charge spent in this way, you get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack).

name: Grisly Totem
text: [reaction] After you commit a card to a skill test, exhaust Grisly Totem: That card gains another instance of one of its skill icons of your choice. If that skill test is successful, the performing investigator draws 1 card.

name: Grisly Totem
text: [reaction] After you commit a card to a skill test, exhaust Grisly Totem: That card gains another instance of one of its skill icons of your choice. If that skill test fails, return that card to your hand.

name: The Council's Coffer
text: Uses (1 [per_investigator] locks). If there are no locks on The Council's Coffer, each investigator searches his or her deck or discard pile for any card and immediately plays it at no cost. Exile The Council's Coffer. (Max once per campaign.) [action] [action]: Test any skill (5). If you succeed, remove 1 lock. Any investigator at your location may activate this ability. Card design by The Council at Arkham Nights 2017.

name: THE HIEROPHANT · V
text: Forced - When you defeat a [[Silver Twilight]] enemy: You leave behind some evidence of the scuffle. Move 1 doom from each enemy at that location to the current agenda.

name: Ends and Means
text: Each [[Silver Twilight]] enemy in a [[Sanctum]] location loses aloof. Forced - When you defeat a [[Silver Twilight]] enemy: You leave behind some evidence of the scuffle. Move 1 doom from each enemy at that location to the current agenda.

name: Infiltrating the Lodge
text: [reaction] After you evade an enemy: Remove all doom from it.

name: Obtaining the Device
text: Objective - If Nathan Wick is added to the victory display by any means, choose an investigator to take control of the attached Puzzle Box, and advance.

name: The Four Keys
text: Objective - If investigators at the same location control the Puzzle Box, the [skull] key, the [cultist] key, the [tablet] key, and the [elder_thing] key, advance.

name: Lodge Gates
text: Enemies cannot spawn at the Lodge Gates. [action]: Resign. On second thought, maybe coming here was a bad idea.

name: Lodge Gates
text: Enemies cannot spawn at the Lodge Gates. [action]: Resign. On second thought, maybe coming here was a bad idea.

name: Lobby
text: Forced - After the Lobby is revealed: Place 1 random set-aside key on it.

name: Lodge Cellar
text: Forced - After the Lodge Cellar is revealed: Place 1 random set-aside key on it.

name: Lounge
text: Forced - After the Lounge is revealed: Put the set-aside Vault and Library locations into play. Put the set-aside August Lindquist asset into play in the Lounge. Place 1 random set-aside key on him.

name: Vault
text: Forced - After the Vault is revealed: Place 1 random set-aside key on it.

name: Library
text: While you are investigating the Library, if you control the [tablet] key, the Library gets -3 shroud.

name: Lodge Catacombs
text: Forced - When Lodge Catacombs is revealed: Put the set-aside Inner Sanctum and each of the set-aside Sanctum Doorway locations into play.

name: Ceremony Room
text: Forced - When the round ends: Each investigator and each [[Ally]] asset in the Ceremony Room takes 1 direct horror. Cancel this effect if an investigator in the Ceremony Room controls the [skull] key.

name: Holding Cells
text: Forced - After Holding Cells is revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Cultist]] enemy and spawn it in the Holding Cells. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Inner Sanctum
text: Forced - After the Inner Sanctum is revealed: Place 1 random set-aside key on it.

name: Nathan Wick
text: Retaliate. [action]: Parley. Test [willpower] (3) to persuade Nathan to let you find another option. If you succeed, place 1 resource on Nathan Wick. Then, if there are 1 [per_investigator] resources on him, add him to the victory display. If you fail, Nathan Wick attacks you.

name: Nathan Wick
text: Alert. Forced - After you evade Nathan Wick by 3 or more: You steal the puzzle box. Add Nathan Wick to the victory display.

name: Lodge Jailor
text: Spawn - Any [[Sanctum]] location. Aloof. Forced - After Lodge Jailor enters play: Place 2 doom and 1 random set-aside key on it. [action]: Parley. Test [intellect] (3). If you succeed, either remove 1 doom from Lodge Jailor, or take control of its key.

name: Cell Keeper
text: Spawn - Any [[Sanctum]] location. Alert. Forced - After Cell Keeper enters play: Place 2 doom and 1 random set-aside key on it. Forced - When you evade Cell Keeper by 2 or more: Take control of its key.

name: Summoned Beast
text: Retaliate. Hunter. Summoned Beast gets +1 fight, +1 evade, +1 damage, and +1 horror for every 2 doom in play. Forced - At the start of the enemy phase: Summoned Beast defeats each [[Humanoid]] enemy at its location. Move all doom from each of those enemies to Summoned Beast. Objective - If the Summoned Beast is defeated, (→R3).

name: Knight of the Inner Circle
text: Spawn - Any location connected to yours. Prey - Most ([skull]/[cultist]/[tablet]/[elder_thing]) keys controlled. Alert. Aloof. Hunter. Forced - After you enter Knight of the Inner Circle's location (or vice-versa): Test [agility] (4). If you fail, Knight of the Inner Circle engages you.

name: Knight of the Outer Void
text: Spawn - Any location connected to yours. Aloof. Peril. Retaliate. Revelation - After Knight of the Outer Void spawns, place either 1 or 2 doom on it. [action]: Parley. Test [willpower] or [intellect] (4). If you succeed, take control of 1 doom on Knight of the Outer Void, and flip it to its clue side. If you fail, Knight of the Outer Void attacks you.

name: Call to Order
text: Revelation - Find the 2 topmost [[Cultist]] enemies in the encounter discard pile and spawn them in the empty location with the most remaining clues. If no [[Cultist]] enemies are spawned by this effect, Call to Order gains surge.

name: Expulsion
text: Revelation - If there are no [[Cultist]] enemies in play, Expulsion gains surge. Otherwise, the nearest [[Cultist]] enemy readies, moves (one location at a time) until it reaches your location, engages you, and makes an immediate attack. Then, place each ([skull]/[cultist]/[tablet]/[elder_thing]) key you control on that enemy.

name: Beneath the Lodge
text: If you control at least 1 ([skull]/[cultist]/[tablet]/[elder_thing]) key, Beneath the Lodge gains peril and its skill test gets +1 difficulty. Revelation - Test [intellect] (3). For each point you fail by, you must either lose 1 clue or take 1 horror.

name: Mark of the Order
text: Surge. Revelation - Check which investigator controls each key. The investigator with... - ...the [skull] key takes 1 damage. - ...the [cultist] key takes 1 horror. - ...the [tablet] key discards 2 random cards from hand. - ...the [elder_thing] key loses 3 resources.

name: August Lindquist
text: [action] Investigators at August Lindquist's location spend 2 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Parley. Each investigator who spent at least 1 clue must either take 1 damage or 1 horror. Remove August Lindquist from the game and take control of his key.

name: Puzzle Box
text: Forced - When you are defeated: Give control of the Puzzle Box to another investigator. [action]: Unlight a brazier at your location, exhaust The Spectral Watcher, or deal 5 damage to The Spectral Watcher if it is exhausted. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity from The Spectral Watcher. (Group limit once per game.)

name: Warning Shot
text:
As an additional cost to play Warning Shot, spend 1 ammo from a [[Firearm]] asset you control.
Move all non-[[Elite]] enemies at your location to a connecting location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Telescopic Sight
text: Fast. Attach to a [[Firearm]] asset you control that takes up two hand slots. Attached asset cannot be used to attack enemies engaged with you. [reaction] When you perform a Fight action using attached asset, if you are engaged with no enemies, exhaust Telecopic Sight: This attack can target a non-[[Elite]] enemy at a connecting location. Ignore the aloof and retaliate keywords for this attack.

name: Knowledge is Power
text: Fast. Play only during your turn. Choose a [[Tome]] or [[Spell]] asset you control, or reveal a [[Tome]] or [[Spell]] asset from your hand. Resolve an [action] or [free] ability on that asset, ignoring all costs (including its [action] cost, if any). Then, if that asset was in your hand, you may discard it to draw 1 card.

name: Esoteric Atlas
text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[action] Spend 1 secret and exhaust Esoteric Atlas: Choose a revealed location that is exactly 2 connections away from your location. Move to that location.

name: Investments
text:
Uses (0 supplies). Limit 10 supplies on Investments.
[free] Exhaust Investments: Place 1 supply on it.
[action] Exhaust and discard Investments: Move all supplies from it to your resource pool, as resources.

name: Decoy
text: Evade. Automatically evade a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location. [reaction] When you play Decoy, increase its cost by 2: Change "a non-[[Elite]] enemy" to "up to 2 non-[[Elite]] enemies." [reaction] When you play Decoy, increase its cost by 2: Change "at your location" to "at a location up to 2 connections away."

name: De Vermis Mysteriis
text: [action] Exhaust De Vermis Mysteriis and place 1 doom on it: Play a [[Spell]] or [[Insight]] event from your discard pile, reducing its resource cost by 1. After that event resolves, remove it from the game.

name: Guiding Spirit
text: You get +1 [intellect]. Non-direct horror must be assigned to Guiding Spirit before it can be assigned to your investigator card. Forced - When Guiding Spirit is defeated by horror: Exile it.

name: Fortune or Fate
text:
Fast. Play when doom would be placed on any scenario card.
Max 1 per game.
Cancel 1 doom just placed on that card. Exile Fortune or Fate.

name: Fated Souls
text: Each investigator cannot leave the location in front of him or her.

name: Beyond the Mist (v. I)
text: [free] During a circle action, spend 1 clue: Reduce the difficulty of this skill test by 2. Objective - If each Unvisited Isle location in play is revealed and the brazier on each of them is lit, advance.

name: Beyond the Mist (v. II)
text: [free] During a circle action, spend 1 clue: Reduce the difficulty of this skill test by 2. Objective - If each Unvisited Isle location in play is revealed and the brazier on each of them is unlit, advance.

name: Beyond the Mist (v. III)
text: [free] During a circle action, spend 1 clue: Reduce the difficulty of this skill test by 2. Objective - If each Unvisited Isle location in play is revealed and the brazier on each of them is unlit, advance.

name: Beyond the Mist (v. IV)
text: [free] During a circle action, spend 1 clue: Reduce the difficulty of this skill test by 2. Objective - If each Unvisited Isle location in play is revealed and the brazier on each of them is unlit, advance.

name: The Binding Rite
text: [free] During a circle action, spend 1 clue: Reduce the difficulty of this skill test by 2. Objective - If The Spectral Watcher is defeated at The Geist-Trap while the brazier there is lit, advance.

name: The Broken Rite
text: [free] During a circle action, spend 1 clue: Reduce the difficulty of this skill test by 2. Objective - If The Spectral Watcher is defeated at The Geist-Trap while the brazier there is unlit, advance.

name: Miskatonic River
text: [action]: Resign. You take your rowboat back to the shore of the Miskatonic River, leaving the mysterious island behind.

name: Forbidding Shore
text: [action]: Circle. Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3) to find the brazier by the wooded trail. If you succeed, you may light or unlight the brazier. Haunted - You must either lose 1 action or lose 2 resources.

name: Unvisited Isle
text: [action]: Circle. Test [willpower]+[intellect] (10) to examine the brazier in front of the standing stone. If you succeed, you may light or unlight the brazier. Haunted - Until the end of the round, increase the difficulty of each skill test during a circle action by 2.

name: Unvisited Isle
text: [action]: Circle. Test [willpower]+[agility] (11) to traverse the mist surrounding the brazier. If you succeed, you may light or unlight the brazier. Haunted - You must either place 1 doom on this location, or take 1 damage and 1 horror.

name: Unvisited Isle
text: [action]: Circle. Test [willpower]+[combat] (11) to clear a path through the woods. If you succeed, you may light or unlight the brazier. Haunted - You must either search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Whippoorwill and spawn it at this location, or the nearest Whippoorwill attacks you.

name: Unvisited Isle
text: [action]: Circle. Test [combat]+[agility] (10) to explore the mossy steps. If you succeed, you may light or unlight the brazier at the top. Haunted - Your next move action this round costs 1 additional action.

name: Unvisited Isle
text: [action]: Circle. Test [intellect]+[agility] (9) to reach the brazier in the center of the spring. If you succeed, you may light or unlight the brazier. Haunted - You must either discard an asset you control, or take 1 damage.

name: Unvisited Isle
text: [action]: Circle. Test [intellect]+[combat] (9) to find the brazier inside the decaying tree. If you succeed, you may light or unlight the brazier. Haunted - Choose and discard 1 card from your hand.

name: The Geist-Trap
text: While The Spectral Watcher is at The Geist-Trap, it gains retaliate. [action]: Circle. Test [willpower]+[intellect]+[combat]+[agility] (20) to complete the ritual, or to disrupt it. If you succeed, you may either light or unlight the brazier here. Haunted - Take 1 damage and 1 horror.

name: Gavriella Mizrah
text:
You get +1 [combat].
[reaction] After an enemy attacks you, even if that attack was canceled, exhaust Gavriella Mizrah: Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Jerome Davids
text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] When an investigator at your location draws a treachery from the encounter deck, exhaust Jerome Davids and discard cards from your hand with a total of at least 2 [intellect] icons: Cancel that card's revelation effect.

name: Penny White
text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test during a revelation effect, exhaust Penny White: Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Valentino Rivas
text:
You get +1 [agility].
[free] During a skill test you are performing, spend 2 resources and exhaust Valentino Rivas: Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1.

name: Gavriella Mizrah
text: Alert. Hunter. Forced - After you successfully attack Gavriella Mizrah, if she is ready: Take 1 horror.

name: Jerome Davids
text: Hunter. Forced - After Jerome Davids engages you: Choose and discard 2 cards from your hand.

name: Penny White
text: Hunter. Forced - After you successfully evade Penny White: Take 1 damage.

name: Valentino Rivas
text: Hunter. Retaliate. Forced - After Valentino Rivas engages you: Lose 2 resources.

name: Whippoorwill
text:
Aloof. Hunter.
Each investigator at Whippoorwill's location gets -1 [willpower], -1 [intellect], -1 [combat], and -1 [agility].

name: Spectral Raven
text: Prey - Lowest [intellect]. Alert. Hunter. Retaliate. Forced - After Spectral Raven engages you: You must either resolve each haunted ability on your location, or Spectral Raven gets +2 fight and +2 evade until the end of the investigation phase.

name: Eager for Death
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (2). Increase this skill test's difficulty by 1 for each damage on you. If you fail, take 2 horror.

name: Psychopomp's Song
text: Surge. Peril. Revelation - Add Psychopomp's Song to any investigator's threat area. Forced - When you would take 1 or more damage: Take 2 additional damage and discard Psychopomp's Song.

name: Death Approaches
text: Surge. Peril. Revelation - Add Death Approaches to any investigator's threat area. Forced - When you would take 1 or more horror: Take 2 additional horror and discard Death Approaches.

name: Marked for Death
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (2). Increase this skill test's difficulty by 1 for each horror on you. If you fail, take 2 damage.

name: Watcher's Gaze
text: Revelation - Each investigator tests [willpower] (5). Each investigator who fails must resolve either the haunted ability on his or her location, or the haunted ability on The Spectral Watcher's location.

name: Mk 1 Grenades
text: Uses (3 supplies). If Mk 1 Grenades has no supplies, discard it. [action] Spend 1 supply: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If this attack is successful, instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 2 damage to each enemy and each other investigator at your location (any additional damage is dealt to the attacked enemy).

name: Agency Backup
text:
Agency Backup may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
[free] Exhaust Agency Backup and deal 1 damage to it: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
[free] Exhaust Agency Backup and deal 1 horror to it: Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Ghastly Revelation
text: Discover 3 clues at your location. Give any number of your clues to another investigator, or place any number of your clues on any location. You are defeated and suffer 1 mental trauma. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Studious
text:
Permanent.
You begin each game with 1 additional card in your opening hand.

name: Small Favor
text:
Deal 1 damage to a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location.
[reaction] When you play Small Favor, increase its cost by 2: Change "Deal 1 damage" to "Deal 2 damage."
[reaction] When you play Small Favor, increase its cost by 2: Change "at your location" to "at a location up to 2 connections away."

name: Another Day, Another Dollar
text:
Permanent.
You begin each game with 2 additional resources.

name: Dayana Esperence
text: Uses (3 secrets). [free]: Attach a non-weakness [[Spell]] event from your hand to Dayana Esperence. Limit 1 event attached to her. The attached event may be played as if it were in your hand. It is not placed in your discard pile after it is played (it remains attached). As an additional cost to play the attached event, exhaust Dayana Esperence and spend 1 secret.

name: Deny Existence
text:
Fast. Play when an encounter card or enemy attack would cause you to do one of the following (choose one): Discard cards from hand, lose resources, lose actions, take damage, or take horror.
You ignore that aspect of the effect. Then, perform the opposite of that aspect (draw cards, gain resources, gain additional actions, heal damage, or heal horror, respectively).

name: Trial by Fire
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Choose one of your skills. Until the end of your turn, set the base value of that skill to 5.

name: Bait and Switch
text: Either (choose one): - Evade. If you succeed and the enemy is non-[[Elite]], evade the enemy and move it to a connecting location. - Evade. Use only on a non-[[Elite]] enemy at a connecting location. If you succeed, evade that enemy and switch locations with it.

name: Anna Kaslow
text:
You have 2 additional tarot slots.
[reaction] When the game begins, if Anna Kaslow is in your opening hand: Put her into play.
[reaction] After Anna Kaslow enters play: Search your deck for a [[Tarot]] asset and put it into play.

name: THE CHARIOT · VII
text: Forced - When doom would be placed on this agenda: Instead, place 1 breach on a number of different random locations equal to 1 more than the number of investigators. Forced - When a breach would be placed on a location with 3 breaches: Instead, resolve an incursion at that location.

name: Dark Knowledge (v. I)
text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance. When this act advances, move all of the breaches on it to the next act.

name: Anette Mason
text: Spawn - Hangman's Hill. Alert. Hunter. Anette Mason gets -2 health for each clue controlled by an investigator. Forced - After 1 or more breaches are placed on Anette Mason's location: Each investigator must either take 1 damage or 1 horror.

name: Beyond the Grave
text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - If Anette Mason is defeated, advance.

name: Dark Knowledge (v. II)
text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance. When this act advances, move all of the breaches on it to the next act.

name: Carl Sanford
text: Spawn - Silver Twilight Lodge. Hunter. Retaliate. Carl Sanford gets -2 health for each clue controlled by an investigator. Forced - After any number of breaches are removed from the current act: Place 1 of them on Carl Sanford's location.

name: New World Order
text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - If Carl Sanford is defeated, advance.

name: French Hill
text: [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Move 1 breach from French Hill to the current act, +1 additional breach for each [willpower] icon on that card.

name: French Hill
text: [action]: Test [willpower] (2). For each point you succeed by, move 1 breach from French Hill to the current act.

name: Rivertown
text: [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Move 1 breach from Rivertown to the current act, +1 additional breach for each [intellect] icon on that card.

name: Rivertown
text: [action]: Test [intellect] (2). For each point you succeed by, move 1 breach from Rivertown to the current act.

name: Southside
text: [free]: Discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck and move 1 breach from Southside to the current act. Choose a [[Power]] treachery discarded by this effect and resolve its revelation ability, if able.

name: Southside
text: [free] Choose and discard any number of cards from your hand: For each card discarded in this way, move 1 breach from Southside to the current act.

name: Uptown
text: [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Move 1 breach from Uptown to the current act, +1 additional breach for each [agility] icon on that card.

name: Uptown
text: [action]: Test [agility] (2). For each point you succeed by, move 1 breach from Uptown to the current act.

name: South Church
text: [action]: Draw the top card of the encounter deck. Then, move all breaches from South Church to the current act. [action]: Resign. You hide through the night.

name: South Church
text: [action] Discard an asset you control from play: Move all breaches from South Church to the current act. [action]: Resign. You hide through the night.

name: Merchant District
text: [action] Discard the top 5, 10, or 15 cards of your deck: For every 5 cards discarded in this way, move 1 breach from Merchant District to the current act. Draw each weakness discarded in this way.

name: Merchant District
text: [free] Spend 2 resources: Move 1 breach from Merchant District to the current act.

name: Hangman's Hill
text: [action]: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Witch]] enemy and draw it. Then, move all breaches from Hangman's Hill to the current act. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Silver Twilight Lodge
text: [free] Take 1 horror: Move 1 breach from Silver Twilight Lodge to the current act.

name: Hangman's Hill
text: [free] Take 1 damage: Move 1 breach from Hangman's Hill to the current act.

name: Silver Twilight Lodge
text: [action]: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Silver Twilight]] enemy and draw it. Then, move all breaches from Silver Twilight Lodge to the current act. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Chaos Manifest
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). Place 1 breach on X different random locations, where X is the amount by which you failed.

name: Primordial Gateway
text: Revelation - Attach to a random location. Place breaches on attached location until there are exactly 3 breaches on it. Treat the attached location as if its printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]). [action]: Test [intellect] or [willpower] (4) to close the gateway. If you succeed, discard Primordial Gateway.

name: Terror Unleashed
text: Revelation - If there are no breaches on your location, place 1 breach on your location. You must take X damage or horror, divided as you wish. X is the total amount of doom and breaches on your location.

name: Lodge Enforcer
text: Spawn - Most breaches (or Silver Twilight Lodge if there are no locations in play with breaches on them). Retaliate. Treat Lodge Enforcer's location as if its printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]).

name: Secrets of the Beyond
text: Revelation - Find the [[Cultist]] enemy in play with the most doom on it. For each doom on that enemy, place 1 breach on that enemy's location. If no breaches are placed by this effect, Secrets of the Beyond gains surge.

name: Witness of Chaos
text: Spawn - Fewest breaches. Hunter. Forced - After Witness of Chaos enters a location: Place 1 breach on that location.

name: Toil and Trouble
text: Peril. Revelation - You must either (choose one): - Resolve the revelation ability on the topmost [[Power]] treachery in the encounter discard pile. - Resolve an incursion at your location.

name: Hallowed Mirror
text: Limit 1 per deck. Forced - After Hallowed Mirror enter play: Search your bonded cards for 3 copies of Soothing Melody. Add 1 to your hand and shuffle the other 2 into your deck. When Hallowed Mirror leaves play, find each of those copies of Soothing Melody (even if they are out of play) and remove them from the game.

name: Soothing Melody
text:
Bonded (Hallowed Mirror).
